title: Hephaestus
subtitle: Transform any floor plan into a photorealistic 360° walkthrough in minutes
description:
The workflow begins with Image + Text-to-Image editing, where the model interprets a blueprint alongside a text prompt (e.g., requesting a "minimalist design") to generate a detailed top-down floor plan. Users can then conversationally refine this plan, adding furniture or changing materials, showcasing Gemini's powerful iterative editing capabilities.

Next, to generate multiple, consistent room perspectives, we use Gemini's Multi-Image to Image composition and Style Transfer. Gemini is given both the floor plan for structural reference and a previous render for stylistic context. This critical step ensures every new image maintains architectural and thematic integrity, creating a believable and cohesive virtual space without visual jarring between different views of the same room.

Finally, the 360° tour is created using Gemini's Advanced composition. By providing the multiple room perspectives as inputs, the model intelligently stitches them into a single, seamless equirectangular panorama. This is more than a simple collage; Gemini understands the spatial relationships between the views. This powerful feature for combining multiple images is central to generating the final immersive experience.

title: DreamGen AI
subtitle: AI App that generates random dreams with you as the main character.
description:
There is a profound neurological gap in entertainment, proven by the very nature of dreams. Our brains are designed to cast ourselves as the main character in the stories we dream each night, yet all mass media forces us into the passive role of a spectator, leaving the most powerful driver of engagement—our own identity—almost entirely untapped.

DreamGen is an innovative generative AI application that transforms a user's photograph and creative prompts into a personalized, fully narrated, 10-scene dream slideshow. By leveraging a sophisticated multi-step AI pipeline, DreamGen places the user as the protagonist in a unique, AI-generated narrative, complete with custom visuals and a corresponding voiceover. The final result is presented as a seamless, interactive, and movie-like slideshow experience, showcasing a powerful fusion of user-centric design and cutting-edge AI capabilities.

The application's functionality is divided into three main phases: Input Collection, the AI Generation Pipeline, and Final Presentation.

title: StickerMe: AI-Powered Instant Sticker Creation with Gemini 2.5 Flash

description:
Stickers have become an essential part of digital communication, enabling people to express emotions, humor, and personality in ways that text alone cannot. Yet creating personalized stickers remains difficult for most users, often requiring design knowledge, expensive tools, or long editing processes. This lack of accessibility prevents many from enjoying creative, customized visual expression in everyday conversations.

StickerMe addresses this challenge by leveraging the power of Gemini 2.5 Flash, supported by Nano Banana, to instantly transform ordinary photos into clean, cartoon-style stickers. Gemini 2.5 Flash’s image-to-image generation ensures rapid transformation, while its segmentation and edge detection capabilities produce sharp, sticker-ready outlines. The model’s style transfer and context-aware rendering further enhance images with smooth colors and professional-quality detail.

These core features enable StickerMe to deliver polished stickers in seconds, without requiring any design skills from the user. What once took minutes of manual editing is now instant and effortless. Users simply upload an image, and the AI does the rest — producing results optimized for sharing, messaging, or even printing. By combining cutting-edge AI with an intuitive interface, StickerMe makes personalized digital expression simple, fast, and free for everyone.

title: StorySpark
subtitle: Immortalize your relationship by turning your photos into a custom comic where you are always the stars, powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash.
description:
Immortalize your relationship by turning your photos into a custom comic where you are always the stars, powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash.

Our project, StorySpark, directly tackles the primary obstacle in AI-driven visual storytelling: character inconsistency. The application's foundation is built upon Gemini 2.5 Flash's advanced multi-modal, image-and-text-to-image generation capability.
For each comic panel, we send a compound prompt to the API. This prompt contains not just a textual description of the scene, but critically, the user-uploaded reference photos of the couple. This technique instructs Gemini to condition its creative output on these specific visual anchors, ensuring it maintains the subjects' distinct likenesses—their faces, hair, and core features—across every panel.
This consistent character generation is not merely an enhancement; it is the central pillar of our application. It transforms our tool from a generic comic creator into a deeply personal narrative engine, allowing users to become the stars of their own story. Without Gemini's ability to ground each generation in reference images, our core promise of immortalizing a real couple's journey would be impossible to deliver, making this feature absolutely essential to our project's existence and "wow" factor.

PeterNanoBano. StorySpark. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/storyspark. 2025. Kaggle

title: ForgeOne – Pro Mode Revolution
subtitle: ForgeOne isn't just a tool for generating. It's a system for delivering.
description:
The first AI image is magic. The fiftieth client edit is a nightmare of endless, frustrating revisions.

Professional work isn't the first shot; it's the fiftieth edit, where the smallest change can break everything. It demands relentless consistency—style, character, and composition—a test where most AI tools drift, forcing costly do-overs and killing momentum. This creative friction is where projects stall and budgets are wasted.

Nano Banana delivered the technical breakthrough for continuity. ForgeOne builds the production workflow on top of it. We automate the bridge from that initial creative spark to the final, client-approved reality, turning consistency from a challenge into a core, reliable feature.

title: Magic Pencil Guide

description:
This application leverages the powerful multi-modal capabilities of the Gemini 2.5 Flash models, which are central to its function as a drawing tutor.

First, it uses the model's image-to-image generation feature to transform a user's uploaded photo into a simple, black-and-white pencil sketch. This provides a clear and stylized reference for the entire tutorial.

Second, and most importantly, the app uses the model's ability to generate an image based on a combination of text and image inputs. For each step, the model is prompted with a text instruction (e.g., "Draw the eyes"), the reference sketch, and the image from the previous step. This allows it to generate a new image showing only the progression for that specific stage.

title: AI power tool for women

description:
Rewa helps users experiment with hairstyles, outfits, and makeup before committing in real life. Our original try-on pipeline used OpenAI’s image models, which often produced flat overlays or struggled with consistency across different angles of a user’s face.
During the Nano Banana Hackathon, we integrated Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana) and completely transformed the experience. Instead of simple overlays, Rewa now uses Gemini’s fusion and editing capabilities to seamlessly blend new styles onto a user’s photo while preserving their identity, facial structure, and natural textures.
To achieve this, we designed a pipeline that chains together multiple mega-prompts rather than relying on single, basic prompts. This approach gave us the consistency we needed hairstyles, makeup, and outfits now stay aligned across lighting conditions, facial expressions, and different selfies of the same person.
With Gemini, hairstyles retain realistic shadows and flow, makeup adapts intelligently to skin tone, and clothes wrap around the body shape rather than floating unnaturally. The result is a true AI-powered style studio: a dynamic self-expression platform where users can visualize their glow-up journey in a way that feels authentic, empowering, and magical.

title: Nano Banana CFD
subtitle: Basic airfoil streamlines simulator using Nano Banana
description:
The process begins with Few-Shot Image Editing. To ensure high-fidelity output, the model is provided with example pairs of input airfoils and their corresponding desired streamline outputs. This few-shot learning guides the model to generate a physically plausible visualization from the user's image. A low temperature (0.05) is used to ensure deterministic results.

Next, the application performs Visual Reasoning and Classification. The newly generated image is fed back into the model in a second API call. A new prompt asks the model to analyze the image it just created and classify the aerodynamic conditions as "Normal flow," "Flow Separation," or "Stall condition."

This technical pipeline—moving from guided generation to analytical reasoning—is central to the app. It transforms a static image into a CFD visualization without needing traditional numerical solvers, making aero analysis highly accessible.

We utilize Gemini's advanced understanding of natural language to transform simple text prompts into rich, visually distinct comic panels. description:
An interactive storybook app that transforms you and your pet into anime heroes using Gemini’s image generation.

For the Nano Banana Hackathon, I developed Storytale: Adventures with You and Your Pet—an interactive storybook app that harnesses Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana) for rapid, high-fidelity AI image generation. The app immerses users and their pets as main characters in beautifully illustrated, anime-style narratives. Leveraging Nano Banana’s real-time image editing capabilities, the storybook dynamically personalizes each character, adapting their poses and facial expressions to perfectly match the unfolding narrative. Characters are first generated on empty backgrounds, and then, through advanced background integration, they are seamlessly composited into a variety of imaginative settings. Whether it’s a neon-lit cityscape, a snowy mountain, or any other scene, the characters blend so naturally into their environments that each page achieves a cohesive, storybook-quality look.

To ensure visual and thematic continuity, the app applies a vivid “K-pop Demon Hunters” style across every page, so the user and their pet maintain a unified artistic identity. The engine intelligently interprets story context and employs prompt-based generation to update details of both characters and backgrounds as the plot evolves, ensuring every scene feels alive and tailored. Beyond storytelling, users also have the opportunity to transform their in-story characters into collectible, toy-like figurine renders, extending Nano Banana’s creative possibilities. Nano Banana’s outstanding speed and flexibility are crucial for these real-time interactions, allowing instant edits, style transfers, and scene updates, all powered by Gemini’s robust image models. The result is a dynamic platform where users see themselves—and their pets—become heroes in their own anime adventure, with seamless integration into every scene, showcasing the true power of Nano Banana for interactive, image-driven applications.

title: Be a fan content creator using Gemini only using Colab
subtitle: In fan communities, AI can be used to create more imaginative content that goes beyond simply editing or combining existing clips of our ido
description:
In fan communities, AI can be used to create more imaginative content that goes beyond simply editing or combining existing clips of our ido

I’ve been a fan of figure skater Yuzuru Hanyu for about 10 years, and I often browse fan-made videos on YouTube, Red Note, and TikTok. Most of these creations remix existing clips with basic editing tools like iMovie or Premiere Pro, but rarely go beyond simple recombination.

This project was inspired by a moment at the Beijing 2022 Olympics, when Hanyu attempted the 4A—the most difficult jump in the world—but fell, and then missed another quadruple jump. As it was his last competition before retirement, he chose to be alone at the kiss & cry section, without his coaches. Every time I reviewed this story, I felt sad and sorrowful. I wanted to imagine a version where things went differently, with him landing successfully and having his coach by his side.

title: Kukulala AI - Personalized Stories
subtitle: Create any story and evolve it to create a unique narrative.
description:
Gemini's text-to-image generation is central to this, translating detailed scene descriptions and character profiles into compelling illustrations for both picture books and multi-panel graphic novels. I push this further by using Gemini's ability to interpret specific stylistic prompts (e.g., "Vintage comic book style"), ensuring a consistent aesthetic throughout the user's journey.

The most innovative application of Gemini is in my graphic novel generator. Here, I utilize its image-and-text prompting (multimodal) understanding. Each panel is generated by providing Gemini with three inputs: a text prompt describing the action, a character reference sheet image to maintain visual consistency, and a panel template image. Gemini intelligently synthesizes these inputs, creating an illustration that adheres to character design, story context, and page layout. This sophisticated use of Gemini's image features is what makes KukuLala AI's deeply personalized and visually rich storytelling possible.

Every restaurant knows this truth: customers eat with their eyes first.
Yet 70% of small food businesses rely on phone snapshots, often taken in bad lighting, making dishes look dull and unappetizing. Professional shoots can cost $500–$1,000 per session—an impossible expense for most small owners.

This is where AI changes the game.
With Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, a single phone photo is instantly transformed into a Michelin-grade masterpiece. Hard mask capabilities preserve the authenticity of the dish, while AI enhances lighting, sharpness, and color—delivering results in seconds, not hours.

Users can generate characters from descriptive text or upload an image and modify it with text prompts, such as ‘add a scar.’ This capability is central to personalizing the story's cast.

title: Global Me AI: See Yourself in a New World
subtitle: https://global-me-ai-158654766447.us-west1.run.app/
description:
Global Me AI is a web application that allows users to explore alternative versions of themselves by reimagining their portraits in different cultural contexts. The core of our application is powered by the advanced image editing and generation capabilities of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image.

We utilize Gemini's powerful natural language image editing and identity consistency. Our prompt instructs the model to retain the user's core facial structure and essence while plausibly adapting features like ethnicity, skin tone, and typical hairstyles to match the target country. This isn't a simple style transfer; it's a deep, semantic reimagining of the source photo.

The most critical feature we used was identity consistency. Gemini maintained the user's core facial structure and essence across wildly different styles, creating believable and personal transformations that other models struggle with. This allows users to create a whole gallery of diverse, high-quality avatars that are all recognizably them, which is the core "magic" of our application.

title: Blueprint Genesis: A Multi-Modal Synthesis Engine
subtitle: An AI-powered design tool that fuses hand-drawn sketches, style images, and text prompts into photorealistic, iterative architectural render
description:
An AI-powered design tool that fuses hand-drawn sketches, style images, and text prompts into photorealistic, iterative architectural render

Blueprint Genesis is a multi-modal synthesis engine designed to revolutionize the creative process, transforming rudimentary concepts into photorealistic realities. Standard text-to-image models are powerful but lack nuanced control. Our application solves this by creating a collaborative workflow between human intuition and AI generation.

We leverage the Gemini 2.5 Flash Image API's core fusion and editing capabilities to create a multi-stage pipeline. The system fuses three distinct user inputs: a hand-drawn structural blueprint, a style reference image for textural DNA, and a text prompt for narrative direction. This multi-modal approach provides a level of artistic control previously impossible.

title: Glamora.fit - Your AI Stylist
subtitle: AI stylist to check if a piece of clothing fits your style, suggest outfit match ideas and help you let go of what no longer serves you.
description:
AI stylist to check if a piece of clothing fits your style, suggest outfit match ideas and help you let go of what no longer serves you.

Glamora.fit: Redefining the Closet with AI
Every closet holds uncertainty—the impulse dress, the jacket that no longer fits, the jeans you hesitate to keep. Glamora.fit turns this dilemma into an AI-powered styling tool that’s fun, practical, and deeply personal.
Using Nano Banana’s cutting-edge image fusion, Glamora.fit lets you snap a photo of yourself, capture a clothing item, and input your lifestyle and goals. Instead of static mix-and-match, the system generates realistic outfit scenarios—placing you in consistent, everyday contexts. Whether you’re a student transitioning to work, an athlete balancing casual and formal wear, or redefining your style identity, Glamora.fit acts like a true stylist.
At its core is the fusion + consistency engine: fusion blends your photos and garments seamlessly, while consistency ensures your look carries across every outfit. The result is more than styling—it’s a personalized evolution engine that helps you decide: does this piece truly belong in my closet?
Glamora.fit is AI as a mirror for self-expression, powered by Nano Banana.
About the builder: I’m Q (https://www.linkedin.com/in/qiushi-z-37764511/), founder/CEO of leylinepro.ai (An entire AI film crew in your browser). Glamora.fit is my first one-woman project—born from my own need to declutter my closet and my curiosity to test Nano Banana for Leyline's workflows. The project video is made on leylinepro.ai, also by myself, in under 2 hours.

Qiushi Z Powers. Glamora.fit - Your AI Stylist. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/glamora-fit-your-ai-stylist. 2025. Kaggle

title: Flickerfy - Nano Banana Powered Flipbook Creator
subtitle: Upload a photo, select an object, and watch it come to life in a stop-motion animation.
description:
Upload a photo, select an object, and watch it come to life in a stop-motion animation.

The process is simple yet powerful. First, Nano Banana analyzes your uploaded photo and identifies prominent objects. You then act as the director, selecting which object to animate—a cloud, a cat, or a coffee cup. The AI generates a sequence of incremental text prompts to guide the animation.

The core magic lies in its frame-by-frame generation loop. Nano Banana creates the first frame based on your original image, then uses that new frame to generate the next, and so on. This "digital game of telephone" ensures a remarkably coherent and fluid stop-motion effect. The final animation is presented in an interactive flipbook player, allowing you to control the speed and download your creation as a high-quality GIF, perfectly blending tactile nostalgia with cutting-edge AI.

title: Visual Forensics Tutor
subtitle: An AI-powered app using Nano Banana to teach digital image forensics, inspired by real-world cybersecurity challenges.
description:
An AI-powered app using Nano Banana to teach digital image forensics, inspired by real-world cybersecurity challenges.

This structured data is the key, enabling the app to programmatically render visual evidence boxes directly onto the image, tangibly connecting the AI's analysis to what the user sees.

Furthermore, the app showcases an intelligent feedback loop: Nano Banana first analyzes the original image (Image → Text), then uses that context to generate a new, subtly tampered version (Text → New Image). This demonstrates a sophisticated level of contextual understanding that turns a simple tool into a powerful, interactive learning platform, addressing a critical need for digital literacy in the cybersecurity space.

title: PicNPick - AI Shopping Assistant
subtitle: PicNPick lets you snap a product photo and instantly find the best live deals online using AI-powered image recognition.
description:
PicNPick lets you snap a product photo and instantly find the best live deals online using AI-powered image recognition.

E-commerce platforms have traditionally depended on text-based search for product discovery. While effective in many cases, this approach limits users who may not know the exact model or specifications of a product. A common scenario is: “I want to buy something identical to this,” but without precise text input, conventional systems return incomplete or irrelevant results.

This challenge is even more pronounced when searching for spare parts and accessories. For example, a user with a laptop that has a dead battery should be able to upload a picture of the device, specify “battery,” and retrieve compatible options. Text-only search often overwhelms users with irrelevant matches or fails to identify the correct part.

title: Navigate the Slip
subtitle: Multi-Agent Visual Deduction Game Powered by Nano Banana
description:
You're about to play a cool AI-powered visual deduction game! In Navigate the Slip, you'll face off against AI agents in a thrilling game of deception through images. Here's how it works: You choose a secret topic—anything from "bananas are radioactive" to "coffee keeps you awake"—and watch as AI players create illustrations one by one. But there's a catch: one of them is a spy who doesn't know your topic!
The spy must fake their way through by analyzing everyone else's drawings, desperately trying to blend in. Meanwhile, legitimate players walk a dangerous line: revealing enough to prove they're real without giving the spy too much information. The result? A tense visual puzzle where every image could be genuine… or a clever fake.
You'll analyze subtle patterns across three increasingly difficult rooms. Is that vague drawing from someone being careful, or a clueless spy? Is that perfect illustration from a real player, or a spy who cracked the code? One wrong guess and it's game over.
Powered by Nano Banana's image generation, the game creates dynamic visual conversations with context-aware AI agents and consistent artistic styles—transforming image AI into an addictive deduction experience.

Kike Gutiérrez. Navigate the Slip. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/navigate-the-slip. 2025. Kaggle

title: Room Furnisher
subtitle: Room Furnisher uses Nano Banana to magically turn empty rooms into fully furnished photos for property managers.
description:
Room Furnisher uses Nano Banana to magically turn empty rooms into fully furnished photos for property managers.

Room Furnisher simplifies property marketing for self-managed property owners by using Google’s Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana) to virtually stage rooms in seconds. Staging is critical for attracting renters and buyers on platforms like Zillow, but it’s expensive, time-consuming, or too technologically advanced for independent landlords, especially since 42% of rental properties are self-managed and 72% of those landlords are over 45.

With Room Furnisher, property managers simply email unfurnished room photos and later view a personalized, Pinterest-style board of their fully staged spaces at RoomFurnisher.com. Gemini 2.5 Flash Image enables this “magic in the background” by transforming empty rooms into high-quality, context-aware furnished images without user intervention.

Blueprint.ai simplifies this process, turning hand-drawn sketches into professional logos and product mockups just by doodling on a digital canvas. Users can draw concepts directly and, with a single click, generate polished visual assets with custom fonts and themes. Iterative design refinements are made easy with drag-and-drop functionality.

Material Forge addresses a common workflow bottleneck in design: exploring how concepts look across different materials. Designers typically spend significant time manually creating variations or relying on mental visualization when considering material options for their work.

The material exploration phase often creates delays in design workflows. Designers need to either sketch multiple versions, create physical mockups, or present concepts without showing material alternatives - all time-intensive approaches that can limit creative exploration.

title: AI Magazine Cover Generator
subtitle: A web application that generates a full year's worth of unique, themed magazine covers from a single source photograph.
description:
A web application that generates a full year's worth of unique, themed magazine covers from a single source photograph.

Content creation is a relentless demand. For brands, influencers, and creators, producing a steady stream of high-quality, themed visual content is a significant bottleneck, requiring photographers, graphic designers, and art directors. Our project, The Cover Story, is a powerful demonstration of how Gemini 2.5 Flash can automate and democratize this complex creative workflow.

The Cover Story is a web application that generates a full year's worth of unique, themed magazine covers from a single source photograph. It puts the power of a professional art director into the hands of any user, allowing them to create a stunning, 12-month visual campaign in minutes, not months.

title: Nano Banana Monster Studio
subtitle: Your all-in-one AI photo editing suite with Batch editing, Photo restoration & a Product Studio.
description:
Your all-in-one AI photo editing suite with Batch editing, Photo restoration & a Product Studio.

Nano Banana Monster Studio is a powerful, AI-powered photo editor that makes professional-grade image manipulation as easy as typing a sentence. Built rapidly using natural language in AI Studio and deployed on Google Cloud Run, it takes you from idea to masterpiece in seconds, all with a fun, banana-themed twist!

Professional photo editing software is often expensive, complex, and intimidating. Our goal was to democratize creative power, building a tool that was not only incredibly capable but also joyful and inspiring to use. We wanted to replace sterile menus and confusing sliders with a simple, conversational interface. The "Nano Banana" hackathon theme inspired us to wrap this power in a whimsical and engaging user experience that encourages experimentation and makes creativity feel like a game, not a chore.

title: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview Usage in the project
subtitle: How it is used in the project.
description:

title: NanoPixelSwap
subtitle: image editor with enhanced consistency
description:
One of the main challenges in current AI-based image tools is the lack of visual consistency. Results often vary when maintaining the same characters, objects, or styles across multiple images. Gemini 2.5 Flash Image overcomes this limitation by generating from both text and image references, supported by one million tokens of context and message chaining. This ensures continuity in every stage of creation.

Another difficulty is the complexity of editing existing images. Many systems fail to preserve quality or coherence, forcing users to restart their work. Gemini 2.5 Flash Image enables precise generation, editing, and text rendering within images, ensuring that modifications remain faithful to the original design and stylistic identity.

Creative workflows also face fragmentation, often requiring multiple tools for generation, annotation, and rendering. This slows down the process and creates inefficiencies. Gemini 2.5 Flash Image integrates all these tasks into a single, unified environment, while retaining long-context understanding for consistent results.

title: Visual Witness System
subtitle: Leveraging Nano Banana's multi-image fusion to reconstruct clear investigative scenes from fragmented and incomplete visual evidence.
description:
Leveraging Nano Banana's multi-image fusion to reconstruct clear investigative scenes from fragmented and incomplete visual evidence.

In criminal investigations, industrial analysis, and historical reconstruction, evidence is rarely a single, perfect picture. Instead, it's a collection of shattered fragments: a blurry security still, a partial witness sketch, a distorted reflection, a technical blueprint. In isolation, these pieces are often inconclusive, leading to investigative dead ends and preventing a clear understanding of events. The core challenge is that no single piece tells the whole story.

The Visual Witness System is a web-based application designed to bridge this critical gap. It is an intelligent investigative aid that ingests multiple, disparate pieces of visual evidence and fuses them into a single, coherent, and photorealistic scene. By providing investigators with a unified picture, our tool transforms fragmented data into actionable intelligence, accelerating analysis and generating powerful new leads.

title: 3D Blueprint Generator
subtitle: An educational tool to generate consistent blueprints for 3D modeling practice.
description:
The Mission
3D modeling is a valuable skill, but often an intimidating one. The first step, creating a model, requires a solid reference. Our project is an innovative application that transforms any image into a series of consistent "blueprints," providing students with a perfect visual reference for practice.

How It Works
The app allows users to upload an image or generate one with AI using a description. From this image, our technology generates consistent views from different angles: front, back, side, and top.

This is achieved by leveraging the capabilities of the Google nano-banana AI model. Its incredible consistency between images allows us to create detailed and precise blueprints that can be directly imported into software like Blender, serving as reference guides for modeling.

title: RoomRecast
subtitle: RoomRecast is a Gemini 2.5 Flash Image / Fal.ai powered editor that lets realtors or interior designers instantly redesign listings / rooms
description:
RoomRecast is a Gemini 2.5 Flash Image / Fal.ai powered editor that lets realtors or interior designers instantly redesign listings / rooms

RoomRecast uses Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (with Fal.ai API) as its visual engine to turn raw listing photos into sell-ready imagery. We rely on three core capabilities: (1) reference-guided consistency, (2) fusion of multiple inputs, and (3) precise, mask-aware editing.

For virtual staging and redecorating, users upload a room photo plus reference images of furniture/finishes they actually plan to use. Gemini’s reference conditioning preserves identity, style, and materials across multiple photos of the same property, so sofas, lamps, or artwork remain consistent from the living room to the bedroom. Fusion lets us blend scene context with several references and a short natural-language brief (e.g., “mid-century walnut + cream textiles”), yielding photorealistic placements with coherent scale and perspective.

This project introduces a playful, interactive approach: using Gemini 2.5 (Nano-Banana) to transform complex concepts into engaging visual analogy stories. Through beautiful scenes, a consistent main character, and dynamic storytelling, abstract knowledge becomes simple, memorable, and fun.

title: Mangafusion
subtitle: Ai comic/manga generator + audiobook for manga
description:
Our app uses Nano Banana as the core feature of Mangafusion, an AI-powered manga generator. However, it is not simply a Nano Banana wrapper. When a user prompts the AI to create a manga, the request is first passed to a planner powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash.
The planner generates a detailed prompt for each page of a 10-page manga. Before page rendering begins, it also creates images of all the characters that may be needed and refers to them with labels such as . Users can additionally provide a reference image to establish the manga’s artistic style.
Page 1 is generated directly from its prompt. Starting from Page 2, each new page prompt includes:
The previous page image for continuity.

This chaining process ensures the manga always remains stylistically and narratively consistent.
Because Nano Banana excels at image editing, Mangafusion also includes an Editor Mode. After a page has been generated, users can prompt further modifications—such as adjusting dialogue, altering the scene, or refining details—while preserving the overall continuity and style.

This "image-in, image-out" workflow, where the model edits and reimagines a source image based on textual commands, is central to the app. It allows users to transform a single product photo into a diverse set of high-quality, context-aware marketing assets, demonstrating the model's advanced creative and generative power.

title: AdVariant Pro: Gerador de Campanhas de Anúncios com IA
subtitle: Uma ferramenta que utiliza o poder do Gemini e ElevenLabs para gerar, corrigir e dar voz a campanhas de anúncios completas.
description:
Uma ferramenta que utiliza o poder do Gemini e ElevenLabs para gerar, corrigir e dar voz a campanhas de anúncios completas.

O AdVariant Pro resolve a ineficiência e o alto custo da criação de campanhas de anúncios para testes A/B. Nossa solução automatiza todo o fluxo de trabalho criativo de forma inteligente.

O projeto utiliza uma cadeia de prompts no ecossistema Gemini: primeiro, o Gemini Pro analisa e corrige ortograficamente os slogans inseridos pelo usuário, garantindo a qualidade da mensagem. Em seguida, o Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana) assume, usando seu poder de fusão de realidade (reality blending) para integrar perfeitamente a imagem do produto em múltiplos cenários. O prompt aprimorado guia o modelo a agir como um diretor de arte, controlando iluminação, composição e renderizando tipografia profissional com precisão. A capacidade do Gemini de executar essa sequência complexa — da correção de texto à composição final da imagem em escala — é a espinha dorsal da nossa aplicação. Para completar o fluxo, integramos o ElevenLabs para gerar locuções de alta qualidade para cada anúncio, transformando os criativos visuais em peças de áudio prontas para a campanha.

title: Outfitify
subtitle: Outfitify creates outfit suggestions based on images of the users wardrobe.
description:
This project leverages Gemini 2.5 Flash Image to create a personalized outfit generation app. The application analyzes a user’s wardrobe by processing uploaded images of their clothing and builds a structured, searchable database.

When the user provides a prompt (e.g., “outfit for a wedding” or “casual coffee meetup”), the app intelligently selects the most appropriate items from the wardrobe. These items are then fused into a realistic mockup look using Gemini 2.5’s advanced image fusion and consistency capabilities. Unlike generic outfit generators, this system generates looks with the user’s actual clothes, ensuring both authenticity and practicality.

The workflow demonstrates how Gemini 2.5 Flash Image goes beyond simple text-to-image by combining visual understanding, context-driven selection, and image generation with consistency across items. While this is a prototype, the ability to generate realistic mockups from real-world data has the potential to revolutionize not only commercial fashion and e-commerce but also everyday wardrobe planning.

subtitle: Toonana converts your journal entries into a comic strip using privacy preserving local LLMs
description:
Toonana converts your journal entries into a comic strip using privacy preserving local LLMs

Our project is a desktop journal app that transforms private diary entries into short comic strips. All sensitive text remains on the device: entries are encrypted and paraphrased locally using Ollama. Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana) is central to the experience, generating the illustrated panels that bring each day’s story to life.

We integrate Gemini by sending only sanitized visual prompts—no raw text or dialogue—through the generateImage endpoint. Each panel request specifies style hints, seeds, and guidance settings to maintain artistic consistency and allow variations. Gemini’s ability to rapidly produce coherent, high-quality images makes it possible to create entire multi-panel strips within seconds.

Vida-Spark is an AI-powered health and travel companion for business and regular travelers, leveraging Gemini 2.5 Flash Image and ElevenLabs to deliver personalized, context-aware wellness and cultural insights. Together, these technologies create an intuitive, immersive experience, saving travelers time and promoting healthier choices, with scalable potential for businesses and regular travellers.

title: Nano Banana Agent
subtitle: Create anything, Explain everything through images with Nano Banana agent
description:
Nano Banana Agent
Nano Banana Agent is a lightweight, modular prompt-rewriting pipeline built on Google’s Artificial Decision Kernel (ADK). It serves as a preprocessing component to refine user input before passing it to a generative image model (Gemini 2.5-Flash-Image). The agent takes raw user prompts, and transforms them via structured JSON output, enforcing constraints on layout, style, content, and tone, improving consistency and generation quality.
Key Features:
Prompt normalization and rewriting: parses free-text user instructions and reformulates them into structured, model-friendly prompts that drive better, more deterministic image outcomes.
Session-based interaction: uses an in-memory session service to maintain continuity and context over a multi-step rewriting workflow, enabling iterative refining of user intentions.
Runner-driven architecture: built as a pipeline of “agent steps” via the ADK Runner interface, making it easy to extend or swap out sub-agents for custom rewriting behaviors.
Minimal dependencies: focuses solely on prompt transformation logic, leaving image generation to Gemini, so it’s fast, easy to integrate, and adaptable to Web or CLI front ends.
Nano Banana Agent acts as the “brains behind the prompt”: cleaning up user input, filling in missing structure (e.g. panel counts, character descriptions, style tags), extracting or injecting JSON fields, and preparing it for image-generation models to consume reliably.

Doan Gia Huy Vu. Nano Banana Agent. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/nano-banana-agent. 2025. Kaggle

The app also leverages Gemini’s text enhancement capabilities to refine story content and generate image descriptions, making Gemini 2.5 Flash Image the core of both the creative and technical workflow.

title: Folk Tale Comic Generator
subtitle: Create a 4-panel comic based off of a given location's folk tales/culture.
description:
Problem Statement
This project uses Gemini 2.5 Flash Image to transform cultural heritage into living comics. The application generates folk tales for any location (via a text model) and presents them as four-panel comic strips (via Nano Banana). Flash Image draws on its world knowledge of myths, symbols, and art styles while maintaining consistency across panels — characters stay recognizable, environments persist, and the sequence reads as a coherent story. Each new frame is generated with the previous ones as input, ensuring narrative progression.

The system also leverages Flash Image’s fusion and editing for personalization. Users can insert themselves into a panel by providing a photo, which is seamlessly mapped into the comic while preserving its style.

The project highlights three core strengths of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image: (1) cultural grounding, (2) panel-to-panel consistency, and (3) fusion/editing for personalization. Together, these enable a unique storytelling experience where every place in the world can rediscover its legends through comics.

This core Gemini feature is the engine that drives the entire creative process. All subsequent features, such as the AI-powered video and music generation, are built upon the unique, personalized assets that only this advanced image editing model can produce, making it indispensable to the app's existence.

title: Imaginator: AI Assisted Visual Learning
subtitle: App powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Preview to create Visual stories with consistency for Learning
description:
Built an educational visual learning app called Imaginator inside AI studio - using the narrative "to teach the why and how behind concepts and not just the what". Imaginator uses three key features of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image to create character-consistent educational stories.
• Nano Banana 🍌 Character Consistency
I have customized prompts to maintain the same historical figure across multiple educational scenes. With nano banana, Imaginator generates 4-12 scenes where Einstein looks consistent as he guides learners through relativity concepts. Before this, each scene showed different-looking people, breaking storytelling flow. This helps people follow familiar guides.
• Concept-Focused Visual Generation
I customized prompts that make Gemini 2.5 Flash Image visualize actual concepts being taught. Instead of portraits, Imaginator's images show spacetime bending or gravity's effects, with the historical figure explaining what's happening. This helps anyone see abstract ideas in action.
• Reference Integration with Style Consistency
Users can upload their own character images or style preferences. Imaginator uses these references with nano banana's consistency features, allowing creators to make material matching their vision while keeping characters recognizable.
This attempts to app turns complex concepts into visual stories that help people understand ideas rather than memorize facts.

Mukul Kulkarni. Imaginator: AI Assisted Visual Learning. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/imaginator-ai-assisted-visual-learning. 2025. Kaggle

title: EndlessCubism – Building the Largest AI-Generated Cubist Artwork
subtitle: EndlessCubism is an infinite collaborative canvas where users can create, edit, and extend seamless cubist-style connected tiles.
description:
EndlessCubism is an infinite collaborative canvas where users can create, edit, and extend seamless cubist-style connected tiles.

EndlessCubism leverages Gemini 2.5 Flash Image's advanced spatial reasoning capabilities to solve an impossible-before problem: generating seamlessly connected painting tiles with perfect edge continuity.

The core innovation centers on neighbor-aware generation, where the system constructs a 3×3 context grid containing existing adjacent tiles positioned around one or several empty tiles. This composite image is sent to Gemini 2.5 Flash Image with carefully crafted prompts that instruct the model to generate content that seamlessly blends with neighboring visual elements.

subtitle: Kids Become Heroes in Personalized AI Stories
description:
SahayakAI: Personalized AI Storyteller is an inclusive, AI-powered storytelling application that transforms how children engage with stories and education. By combining the power of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image with multi-modal learning, SahayakAI allows any child to become the hero of their own story.

Users can upload a photo of themselves or friends, and SahayakAI generates a complete story experience where their likeness is consistently illustrated across scenes—whether in a classroom, on a playground, or in a fantastical adventure. Beyond just text-to-image, our application demonstrates Gemini’s visual in-context learning by blending real-world faces into AI-generated illustrations while maintaining style, lighting, and narrative consistency.

The system also generates AI audio narration, turning each story into an interactive audio-visual journey. Teachers and parents can go further by creating teaching kits around any story or topic, including lesson plans, mindmaps, and classroom activities, making learning highly engaging and culturally relevant.

title: Fashion Assistant
subtitle: visualize with Ease
description:
Traditional virtual try-on tools focus on single, isolated items. This project's innovation is its session-based, iterative approach. The output from one styling step (e.g., adding a dress) becomes the input for the next (e.g., layering a jacket), creating a fluid, cumulative "mix-and-match" experience that more closely mirrors how people actually assemble an outfit.

The notebook is structured to demonstrate the core capabilities of our Continuous & Iterative Styling Engine:

This project is intentionally self-contained to highlight the power of the core model.

title: AI Hero's Journey – The First True AI-Illustrated RPG with Persistent Characters
subtitle: A new era of RPGs: illustrated, immersive, and uniquely yours.
description:
AI-Illustrated RPGs have always struggled with one core problem: character consistency across scenes. Traditional solutions rely on costly custom art or generic assets where every player looks the same. Standard AI generators break immersion, producing characters that look completely different from one scene to the next.

Our project changes that. With Gemini 2.5 Flash Image and Nano Banana, we use multi-image fusion to establish a hero’s “visual DNA.” A single portrait is combined in real time with weapons, armor, and environments—so your hero’s exact face persists seamlessly across taverns, forests, castles, and battles.

Gemini 2.5 Flash Image powers this breakthrough through:
Multi-image composition – fusing portraits with equipment, poses, and classes
Scene generation – integrating characters into dynamic story environments
**Real-time consistency **– maintaining visual identity across narrative branches

title: Unfade AI: Instant Photo Restoration
subtitle: Restore old photos in seconds: free watermarked preview, pay once for the clean high-resolution download.
description:
This project is a SaaS platform built with Lovable, integrated with Google’s Nano-Banana (Gemini) AI model for advanced photo restoration.

If the user is satisfied with the result, they can proceed to secure payment (via integrated checkout). Once payment is confirmed, the user gains access to download the full restored photo without watermark in high quality.

This ensures trust and transparency: users only pay when they already know the result. Future versions of the platform will also include the option to request manual refinement by a human specialist for cases where the AI restoration alone is not enough.

title: AI Interior Designer
subtitle: This app uses AI to generate custom room designs by combining a user's room image, furniture photos, and a voice-transcribed description.
description:
This app uses AI to generate custom room designs by combining a user's room image, furniture photos, and a voice-transcribed description.

The AI Interior Designer is a sophisticated web application that empowers users to visualize and create stunning interior design concepts with the help of artificial intelligence. It transforms a user-provided image of a room into a professionally designed, photo-realistic space. Users can incorporate their own specific furniture pieces and provide detailed text or voice descriptions of their desired aesthetic, allowing for a highly personalized and creative experience.
The application serves as an excellent demonstration of advanced multimodal AI capabilities, seamlessly blending image and text inputs to produce a high-quality visual output.

Core Functionality
The application is built around a simple, intuitive workflow divided into input and output sections:

title: Pixelart Spritesheet Creator
subtitle: Instantly turn your ideas into game-ready, animated pixel art characters!
description:
The Pixelart Spritesheet Creator is fundamentally powered by the versatile image generation capabilities of Gemini 1.5 Flash. The application’s workflow is built upon two core features of the model: text-to-image and image-and-text-to-image generation. It was completely generated using Google AI Studio Builder.

Initially, a user’s prompt leverages the model's text-to-image capability to create a high-quality, style-consistent base character sprite.

From there, every key feature in the application-generating multi-view turnarounds, creating new action poses, and the powerful Reskin tool - relies on the model's advanced image-and-text understanding. Instead of generating from scratch, the app provides an existing sprite as a strong visual reference along with a new text instruction. This iterative process is central to maintaining character consistency across dozens of assets.

title: Shader Inspiration Engine
subtitle: It turns prompts like "glowing forest" into detailed visuals, generates matching images, and analyzes their colors and features.
description:
It turns prompts like "glowing forest" into detailed visuals, generates matching images, and analyzes their colors and features.

Shader Inspiration Engine is an innovative creative tool that leverages the powerful capabilities of Google Gemini 2.5 Flash Image to transform textual descriptions into visual art and real-time shader effects. At the core of this project is Gemini 2.5 Flash Image's multimodal image generation capability, which enables the generation of high-quality visual descriptions and corresponding image content based on user prompts.

Gemini 2.5 Flash Image plays several crucial roles in the application: First, it understands natural language prompts, converting abstract concepts (such as "a city made of glass" or "a forest with glowing mushrooms") into detailed visual descriptions. Second, it possesses image generation functionality that directly creates visual content matching these descriptions. Finally, its visual comprehension capability allows the system to analyze the color composition and visual characteristics of generated images.

title: Super Banana
subtitle: Generate professional thumbnails and product photos instantly like a magic.
description:
For thumbnails, the app intelligently combines user-uploaded assets—like images of people or text—with a descriptive prompt to generate a cohesive, click-worthy design. A key feature central to this process is the model's ability to automatically remove backgrounds from these assets, seamlessly integrating subjects into new scenes as instructed by the user's prompt. ( Got Amazing Results 😍)

Similarly, the product photo generator (aka pro-product photo shooter powered by Nano Banana) uses the model to place an object into a completely new, realistically rendered environment based on a simple text description. This allows users to create stunning lifestyle or catalog shots without physical photoshoots.

These advanced image editing and generation features are the engine of Super Banana and powered by Nano Banana, transforming simple inputs into polished, professional-quality visuals with minimal effort.

When generating images from a text storyboard to create multi-page stories with multiple panels, consistency is a key element to ensure the characters and overall art style remain the same across every image.

title: 🍌 Memory Resurrection Engine - Nano Banana Hackathon
subtitle: Using Nano Banana's unique character consistency and multi-image fusion capabilities, we reunite families across generations
description:
Using Nano Banana's unique character consistency and multi-image fusion capabilities, we reunite families across generations

Families lose irreplaceable connections when loved ones pass away. Children never meet their grandparents, new spouses don't get to experience family history, and precious memories fade with time. The $78B digital legacy market shows families desperately want to preserve and extend their connections across generations.

Using Nano Banana's unique character consistency and multi-image fusion capabilities, we reunite families across generations by placing deceased loved ones into modern family moments - weddings, graduations, meeting new babies, holiday gatherings.

title: UpStage AI: Complete Renovation Planning with AI-Powered Intelligence
subtitle: AI-driven interactive platform that transforms renovation ideas into photorealistic visuals and comprehensive business plans
description:
AI-driven interactive platform that transforms renovation ideas into photorealistic visuals and comprehensive business plans

Crucially, this model enables our "Interactive Design Chat," a key retention feature. By using the last generated image as context for the next prompt, it creates a dynamic design session where users can conversationally refine details like "change the floor to dark wood." This transforms the experience from static to collaborative, making users feel a professional designer is at their fingertips. The model also composites a user's photo into the scene, a powerful personalization feature creating a deep emotional connection.

While visuals are core, our business intelligence comes from the Gemini 2.5 Flash text model. Using its structured JSON output, it generates the entire analysis dashboard—from a detailed ROI calculation that justifies renovation spend, to actionable project timelines and a breakdown of materials, turning our tool from a simple visualizer into an indispensable financial and project planning partner.

The idea behind CoverLoop is to give artists a simple way to create engaging visuals when they don’t have the resources to produce a full music video. By uploading an album cover, the system automatically interprets its theme, generates a matching animated background, and composites the original artwork on top, producing a looping visualizer that can be used for YouTube, Spotify Canvas, TikTok, etc. (if you're unfamiliar with these visualizers, here are examples 1 and 2)

While current AI video models are still limited, especially when it comes to generating perfectly seamless loops, this project demonstrates the potential of combining image understanding, background generation, and video animation into a single workflow.

A personal AI stylist that uses Gemini to analyze your look, suggest creative changes, and generate a photorealistic new you in seconds.

The inspiration was to move beyond simple "apply a filter" applications and create something genuinely creative and personalized. I wanted to empower users to visualize significant style changes—a new haircut, a different fashion sense, a dramatic background—without any risk or cost. The launch of the 'Nano-Banana' model, with its impressive in-painting and image editing capabilities, was the perfect catalyst to build this user-centric style exploration tool.

**Image Upload & Verification: **The user uploads a portrait or takes a new one with their webcam. The gemini-2.5-flash model immediately performs a verification check to ensure the image is a suitable, high-quality portrait of a single person. This crucial first step prevents errors and sets the stage for a better result.

title: PlantAI: Multi-Language Plant Disease Detection with Google Gemini AI
subtitle: A web application that detects plant diseases using Google Gemini AI with real-time analysis.
description:
A web application that detects plant diseases using Google Gemini AI with real-time analysis.

Plant diseases cause $220 billion in annual crop losses globally, with farmers in developing regions lacking immediate access to agricultural expertise. Traditional diagnosis requires days of waiting for specialist consultation, during which diseases spread and crops deteriorate.

PlantAI leverages Gemini 2.5 Flash's multimodal image analysis capabilities as its core diagnostic engine, utilizing advanced image understanding, structured response generation, multilingual visual reasoning, and real-time confidence calculation to transform Gemini from a conversational AI into a specialized agricultural diagnostic tool.

title: bring your friends on a wacky adventure
subtitle: BYFOAWA is a build your own game story book adventure where you transform your real friends and take them to weird places, all generative.
description:
BYFOAWA is a build your own game story book adventure where you transform your real friends and take them to weird places, all generative.

We created an interactive storytelling game where players upload photos of friends, transform them into fantasy characters, and guide them through absurd choose-your-own-adventure scenarios with persistent visual continuity.
Gemini flash powers our Character Portrait system, converting real photos into fantasy D&D characters while preserving facial recognition. Most critically, Gemini's multi-image processing enables our Squad Photo Generation, where we send multiple transformed character portraits and receive cohesive group scenes with proper character placement and identity preservation.
Our Character Identity Persistence System relies on Gemini's ability to reference previous images during transformations. When characters gain battle scars or magical powers, we send their current portrait alongside transformation instructions, ensuring visual continuity while accumulating changes. The model's prompt understanding prevents character mix-ups in group scenes through explicit image-to-character mapping ("IMAGE 1 = Alice, IMAGE 2 = Bob").
Gemini 2.5 Flash text generation drives our Dynamic Story Generation, creating 7-beat adventure narratives with branching choices, while generating contextual character customization options based on world settings. The streaming capabilities provide real-time story generation, and JSON-structured responses enable complex game data parsing for choices, transformations, and scene descriptions.
Without Gemini's multi-modal processing and image consistency features, maintaining recognizable characters across hundreds of generated scenes would be impossible.

Thomas Tobin. bring your friends on a wacky adventure. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/bring-your-friends-on-an-adventure. 2025. Kaggle

title: BananaForge
subtitle: Turn text prompts into consistent front/back 3D figure images with Banana Nana, powered by Gemini Flash and ready for STL conversion
description:
Turn text prompts into consistent front/back 3D figure images with Banana Nana, powered by Gemini Flash and ready for STL conversion

The biggest challenge when turning a 2D concept into a 3D model is the lack of consistency. If you ask most AI models to create a front and a back view of a character, you get two separate images that don't match. Details like colors, shapes, or accessories will be different, making it impossible to merge them into a believable 3D object. As the comparison images show, other models fail at this task. This project was built to solve exactly this problem.

After testing several leading AI image models, it became clear that Google's Gemini has a unique ability to produce perfectly consistent results when instructed to.

title: Sketch Star: Creative Problem Solving Game, with Gemini
subtitle: Draw solutions, watch Gemini create animated stories of success or hilarious failure.
description:
Draw solutions, watch Gemini create animated stories of success or hilarious failure.

Drawing and creative problem solving are so much fun! Now Gemini 2.5 Flash makes those drawings come alive.

You draw your solution. Maybe you add a ladder, maybe a trampoline, maybe wings.

title: SafePost..
subtitle: AI Photo Anonymizer
description:
SafePost is an AI-powered photo anonymization tool that automatically removes personally identifiable information (PII) from images before they are shared online. Traditional methods rely on manual editing or crude blurring, which is time-consuming and makes photos look censored.

Faces are replaced with synthetic, non-existent identities that match the original pose, lighting, and style.

Users can choose between realistic anonymization or customizable “privacy styles” (subtle blur, artistic overlays, stickers).

title: Pawsport Photos
subtitle: Your Pet's World Tour Adventure!
description:
"Pawsport Photos" is a whimsical application that transforms a single pet photo into a worldly travel album, an experience powered entirely by the Gemini API.

The model's ability to maintain the pet's unique appearance—its breed, fur color, and distinct markings—across every new, diverse scene is central to the application's magic. It doesn’t just create a generic cat in Paris; it creates your cat enjoying a croissant in front of the Eiffel Tower.

This powerful inpainting-like feature allows the app to generate a cohesive and believable photo series from a single input. To complete the experience, we also use the gemini-2.5-flash text model to generate witty, location-aware Instagram captions for the album, adding a final layer of polish and utility.

This AI-powered editor transforms your photos using simple text descriptions and precise masking for detailed control.

It's basically a smart photo editor that lets you skip the complicated tools. You just upload a picture and tell the AI what you want to change in plain English, like "add sunglasses" or "make the background look like a forest." For more precise changes, you can even paint over the exact area you want to edit.

tornadog. Prompt to Pixel: A Deep Dive into the AI-Powered Nano Banana Studio. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/prompt-to-pixel-a-deep-dive-into-the-ai-powered-na. 2025. Kaggle

title: The Style Alchemist
subtitle: The Style Alchemist uses AI to transform amateur product photos into stunning, professional marketing campaigns for online sellers.
description:
The Style Alchemist uses AI to transform amateur product photos into stunning, professional marketing campaigns for online sellers.

For millions of online sellers, the inability to produce professional product photography is a critical barrier to success. Their high-quality products are often ignored due to amateur, poorly lit photos, directly impacting sales and brand perception.

The true innovation is our "Style DNA" feature, which utilizes Gemini's advanced multi-modal understanding. The model analyzes an "inspiration image" to deconstruct its abstract aesthetic—mood, color, and composition—and applies it to the new creation. This, combined with iterative natural language editing for fine-tuning, transforms the complex creative process into an intuitive, instantaneous tool. These Gemini features are not peripheral; they are the fundamental engine that makes our Virtual Photoshoot Studio possible.

title: Reelchemist_AI
subtitle: ReelChemist AI: The ultimate prompt-to-video solution.
description:
We developed "Left Swipe" as a proof-of-concept during a hackathon to demonstrate the full capabilities of our ReelChemist AI platform. This short sci-fi film was generated entirely from a screenplay, showcasing how our 9-phase automated production pipeline transforms raw text into a complete cinematic video.

Gemini 2.0-Flash 🤖
This AI served as the brain of the operation, handling
screenplay parsing and video generation orchestration. It analyzed the raw text, extracting key elements like characters, scenes, and dialogue, and then structured this data into a usable format for the other AI services. It was also used to create detailed video prompts for Google Veo.

Stability AI 🖼️
We used Stability AI for
character and scene visual generation. The AI took the character descriptions and scene settings from the parsed screenplay and created detailed visual reference sheets for the characters and atmospheric images for each location.

subtitle: Chronica brings loved ones closer by turning photos into meaningful stories, helping everyone preserve memories that matter most.
description:
Chronica brings loved ones closer by turning photos into meaningful stories, helping everyone preserve memories that matter most.

We live in a world where distance separates us. Families are spread across cities. Couples live across oceans. Life keeps us apart.

And when that happens, what we miss most are not the big things. We miss the little ones. The smile across the table. The warmth of a hug. The feeling of being together.

description:
An AI tool that turns character sheets and scripts into consistent manga panels using Gemini 2.5 Flash.

MangAI reimagines the way manga can be created — transforming simple prompts into expressive, consistent panels. Instead of spending hours sketching character sheets or redrawing the same background for every scene, creators can focus entirely on storytelling. By defining characters, environments, and panel actions, MangAI ensures that designs remain consistent across multiple frames, preserving the flow and style of a real manga.

At its core, the project leverages Gemini 2.5 Flash Image’s strengths in consistency, detail, and editing, allowing artists to guide the generation process step by step. A character described once will look the same in every panel; a rooftop at sunset stays recognizable from start to finish. This reliability unlocks creative freedom. Writers, hobbyists, and professional manga artists alike can prototype stories faster, experiment with new ideas, or generate polished drafts to refine later.

title: Interactive AI Storybook with Google Nano Banana

description:
To enhance creativity, I integrate Gemini’s text-to-image refinement and style control, allowing outputs in formats such as cartoon, watercolor, or sketch. This flexibility makes it possible to adapt the same story for different classrooms, reading levels, or cultural contexts.

Beyond illustrations, the app includes a read-aloud mode using Google TTS with karaoke-style word highlighting, turning passive reading into an engaging, interactive activity. For further improvement, the narration could be enhanced with more natural-sounding voices from services like ElevenLabs, making the experience even more immersive and accessible.

Gemini’s advanced image generation is central to this application. Without its ability to maintain character and scene consistency, the storybook would lack coherence and educational value. By pairing Gemini with storytelling workflows, this project showcases how AI can revolutionize education, literacy, and creative engagement for children.

Bedtime Story generator a using nano banana for consistent image generation and eleven labs for audio narration.

This project uses Gemini 2.5 Flash Image to bring children’s bedtime stories to life through interactive, visually consistent storytelling. I leveraged Gemini’s character and attire consistency to generate panel-by-panel illustrations where the same characters appear seamlessly across scenes. This ensures that children can follow the story without distraction, unlike traditional image generation tools where characters often change.
By pairing this with Nano Banana, created an end-to-end storytelling experience where a static bedtime narrative becomes a dynamic visual journey. Parents can input a simple story, and the system generates an illustrated, semi-animated version within minutes.

Also used eleven labs ai for audio narration for more interactive experience. The audio narration goes on with the captioned image slide.
Entire journey is soothing and relaxing.

title: MockupMagic — Fast, Consistent Product Mockups
subtitle: For small shops: create on-brand photos in seconds and refine lighting/props without redoing the shot.
description:
For small shops: create on-brand photos in seconds and refine lighting/props without redoing the shot.

What it does
MockupMagic creates studio-quality product photos from a single product image and a one-line scene description. Sellers upload a PNG/JPG/WEBP, toggle “Enhance prompt,” and get realistic mockups in seconds.

Why it’s useful
Replaces costly photo shoots and lets small stores publish more listings, faster. Refinements keep the same base image consistent while applying only the requested changes (lighting, props, accessories).

title: BananaSplit: Git for Images with Gemini Banana
subtitle: BananaSplit: Visual Git for images - commit, branch, merge & lock edits with natural language, powered by Gemini Banana.
description:
BananaSplit: Visual Git for images - commit, branch, merge & lock edits with natural language, powered by Gemini Banana.

BananaSplit brings Git-style workflows to visual editing. Instead of endless “final_v7.png” files, every edit becomes a commit in a version history tree. Users can branch into new directions (e.g., ryokan, Scandinavian, boho), merge styles together, or lock elements so they remain consistent.

Our demo starts with a black-and-white sketch of a living room, then shows how Gemini Banana powers dynamic transformations: turning the same space into ryokan, Scandinavian minimal, industrial loft, bohemian eclectic, and dreamy pastel versions. These branches are then merged and refined, all while preserving a visual history graph.

description:
HyperLeap AI is an agentic marketing platform that automates the creation of hyper-localized ad campaigns.

HyperLeap AI is an agentic marketing platform that automates the creation of hyper-localized ad campaigns. Gemini 2.5 Flash Image is the core creative engine that transforms raw local data into stunning, on-brand visuals that connect with communities.
Our system leverages Gemini’s world knowledge and reality fusion to create context-aware ads, fusing a brand's product with the specific vibe and landmarks of a target neighborhood. This creates an immediate, authentic connection, as seen in our demo where a coffee product is placed in a scene featuring Berkeley's Sather Gate.
The true "wow" factor lies in the interactive refinement loop, powered by Gemini’s natural language editing and in-painting. A marketing manager can instantly direct changes like "change the drink to a latte" or "make the scene feel like evening," altering the entire campaign's narrative with simple text.
This dynamic visual intelligence, combined with product and brand consistency across all generated assets, ensures every ad feels both authentic to the brand and perfectly native to the community. This synergy transforms a national marketing strategy into thousands of personal, community-level conversations, a feat previously impossible at this scale and speed.

Consistent Visual Generation — In “Word Shrinker,” Nano Banana generates clean, minimal icons for word parts (e.g., “CAR” → 🚗) — maintaining visual coherence across puzzles, even under tight constraints.
We didn’t just use Nano Banana for “text-to-image.” We used it to edit reality, judge creativity, and fuse meaning — turning AI into a collaborative partner in visual thinking. Whether shrinking “CARPENTER” into icons + letters or mashing “STAR” + “FISH” into one image, Nano Banana’s intelligence is the silent hero.
normally NANO-BANANA is used to create eCommerce product designing, and photographic edits, But we used it for Learning and Unlocking our Creative Skills.

title: MahoraStyle 🍌
subtitle: Nano-banana perfect wheel ??
description:
Nano‑Banana extracts pure artistic style from multiple reference images, fuses those styles into a single, high-quality textual style description, and applies that fused style to a target image while preserving its content. The server uses Gemini 2.5 Flash Image capabilities to analyze inline images and return structured textual descriptions, to generate fused textual style descriptions with controlled prompts, and to produce final stylized images by sending inline image data together with the fused style prompt. These Gemini features (image-aware prompt extraction, JSON-friendly text output, and image generation via generateContent / generateContentStream) are central: they allow us to reliably isolate style (not subject), programmatically compose styles with influence weights and options, and perform single-shot image stylization that preserves semantic content. The result is an interactive, low-friction pipeline that gives users control over blend weights, texture emphasis, color source, and quick iteration for creative exploration.

Ryomen Sukuna. MahoraStyle 🍌. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/mahorastyle. 2025. Kaggle

title: Mama Montaña
subtitle: Andean Mountain Range Sci-fi World
description:
World Creation: In the high, unforgiving peaks of the Andes, a new kind of protector soars. She is not an outsider with powers, but a native daughter of the mountains, chosen by the very creatures often seen as harbingers of death: the vultures. Unlike those who see these birds as a threat, she was raised to revere them. Instead of being preyed upon, she was selected by the vultures, a symbiotic relationship born of respect and mutual survival. They are her guardians, their vast wings and keen eyes a shield against those who would harm the land and its people. The ancient gods of the mountains granted her the gift of foresight, allowing her to see the devastating consequences of greed before they happen. This vision is a heavy burden, but it's tempered by the wisdom she has inherited from her ancestors, passed down through generations of Andean storytellers. She doesn't just repel attacks; she inspires a deeper connection to the earth, a reminder that we are all part of a delicate web, and that the greatest strength lies not in domination, but in harmony. Selected ElevenLabs as the track given voiceover and the rarity it is to hear senior voices.

title: AI Memorial Portrait Generator
subtitle: A Dignified Solution for Families Facing Sudden Loss
description:
Most families do not prepare a memorial portrait in advance.
When faced with a sudden loss, they often struggle to find a suitable photo of their loved one. This leads to situations where families:
• Use a low-quality ID or group photo, enlarged awkwardly
• Pay $100–$250 (₩150,000–₩300,000) at funeral halls for emergency editing
• Experience guilt, knowing that the memorial portrait will remain as the lasting image of the deceased

Our Solution: AI Memorial Portrait Generator
• Upload a single photo → Get a dignified memorial portrait in seconds
• AI automatically adjusts background, clothing, and tone for funeral appropriateness
• Built as a Vercel web app with a LangChain-powered pipeline and image generation AI models

Impact & Results (first 24 hours)
• Prototype developed in just 3 hours (Sept 7, 2025)
• 30,000 views on Threads
• 553 site visits and 492 transformations processed
• User feedback highlighted both cultural sensitivity concerns and strong practical necessity

title: SpeakScenes
subtitle: Teacher in New environments
description:
SpeakScenes lets you generate a single ESL teacher and keep their identity consistent while reimagining new scenes with plain English. Using Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (“nano-banana”), the app creates a base teacher image and then applies targeted, text-only edits to change the setting, outfit, and mood—without rebuilding the character from scratch.
The UI is one page: choose a seed teacher (or use the sample), type a scene instruction, and click Next Scene to step through locations like a rainy bus stop, an open-plan office, or a sunny café in Barcelona. A “Make Another Variant” option enables quick alternates, and you can download results as PNGs.

Impact: Teachers and learners can spin up realistic conversation prompts in seconds for lessons, emails, and social posts.

Whenever I’m shopping online, I always catch myself asking the same question: “Yeah, it looks good on the model… but will it look good on me?” Imagine if your browser actually knew who you are and could help answer that question across any store — showing whether that shirt is oversized on you, or how well that jacket matches the rest of your vibe.

That was the dream: a Chrome extension that could swap product models with your own photo on any online store. Because time was short, I narrowed it down to a simpler but still fun prototype: American Eagle’s store, where you can swap the model with a celebrity of your choice. Think of it as a playful “what if?” demo of the bigger vision.

title: Guardian Gaze – AI-Powered Home Inspector, Energy Auditor & Safety Consultant
subtitle: Guardian Gaze is an AI app that turns your phone into a smart home inspector.
description:
Homeowners often face uncertainty about hidden structural defects, energy inefficiencies, and safety risks in their homes. Detecting such issues typically requires hiring expensive experts or relying on unreliable DIY methods.
Guardian Gaze solves this problem by leveraging the power of advanced image analysis using Gemini 2.5 Flash Image features. These features provide precise pixel-level inspection and semantic understanding of home images, allowing our app to detect early-stage water stains, hairline cracks, thermal leaks, and potential safety hazards that are invisible to the naked eye.

Key Gemini 2.5 Flash Image features used include high-resolution image encoding, object detection, semantic segmentation, and predictive simulation.
These are central to our application:

Semantic segmentation enables precise identification of areas such as damaged surfaces or draft sources.

title: Math Story Labs
subtitle: Adventure Math
description:
Bulgaria ranks last in both economy and math literacy within the EU; only ~46% of 15-year-olds reach basic math proficiency (PISA). In an AI-driven age, digital transformation and better learning experiences are essential. Math teaches pattern-thinking and "connecting dots" — if taught through relatable stories it can spark curiosity and capability. Bored?Opposite uses fun, everyday narratives to help kids understand math by showing relevance first, then teaching concepts.

Bored?Opposite transforms 11 difficult math topics into short comic strips, explainer videos, and an interactive AI tutor (Maya). Kids meet concepts through short, cheesy stories, then watch a 60–90s explainer and interact with Maya who guides step-by-step problem solving, adapts to the learner, and answers follow-ups.

What we learned:
AI accelerates production, but human curation is essential for quality, voice, and pedagogical correctness. Gemini’s image consistency & editing features are pivotal for serialized storytelling. With the right stack, a solo creator can scale output that would normally require a small team.
