description:
AI Image Editor which uses Nano-Banana to make stunning edits out of your images.

The app's core functionality is built on two key features of the Nano Banana model:

Fusion and Style Transfer: Users can convert simple sketches into vibrant, fully colored illustrations with a single prompt. For example, a black-and-white line drawing is transformed into a rich, detailed artwork, automating a traditionally complex creative workflow. * Object and Attribute Editing: The app enables precise, word-based edits to specific elements within an image. A user can simply ask to "change the pink dinosaur to green," and the model intelligently re-colors the subject while maintaining the surrounding environment and lighting.
By making these sophisticated tools accessible through intuitive text prompts, DripEditz showcases the future of creative applications, demonstrating how AI can build the next generation of dynamic, language-driven photo editors. Google's AI Studio has also been used for the application development.

title: Latent Studio art submission
subtitle: Latent Studio is a full-fledged, ai-driven photo editor for retouching and compositing—configurable to your workflow.
description:
Latent Studio is a full-fledged, ai-driven photo editor for retouching and compositing—configurable to your workflow.

Latent Studio uses Gemini 2.5 Flash Image as the core engine for all editing. We rely on four features: text‑driven editing; multi‑image fusion with multiple reference images for identity consistency; vision‑language reasoning (chat + vision) to inspect uploaded image(s), infer intent, and draft a structured action prompt; and region‑bounded edits via hotspot (when provided) with conservative global adjustments otherwise.
These features are central to our demos, because they let users steer complex, production‑grade edits with sentences, not layers. Gemini 2.5 Flash Image preserves face, pose, and skin tone while performing retouching, cleanup, relighting, background fitting, and reference‑guided fusion in near‑real time. The conversational surface explains each decision and allows corrective follow‑ups, so language becomes pixels with traceable steps.
We also use Gemini Image 4 for new image generations, and can be directly add to the project for smooth workspace.

Renyi Cao. Latent Studio art submission . https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/latent-studio-art-submission. 2025. Kaggle

title: MangaScience - Fun Science For Kids
subtitle: Manga Science brings science to life for kids with Dr. Manga, Koko, and Momo, presenting experiments and concepts in a fun, colorful, manga
description:
Manga Science brings science to life for kids with Dr. Manga, Koko, and Momo, presenting experiments and concepts in a fun, colorful, manga

Kids often lose interest in science because traditional textbooks feel dry, complicated, and disconnected from their daily lives. While science is full of wonder, the way it is usually taught makes it hard for children to stay curious and engaged. MangaScience changes this by introducing a whole new way of learning through the world of manga.
Manga, the popular Japanese graphic novel style, has captured the imagination of kids worldwide. By combining this storytelling style with education, MangaScience transforms science lessons into fun, adventure-filled comic book stories that kids actually want to read.

Together, they take children on exciting adventures through the world of science exploring chemistry through bubbling potions, physics through thrilling action scenes, and biology through lively storytelling. Instead of memorizing definitions, kids see concepts come alive in ways they can relate to and remember.

title: Kitchen Chef
subtitle: Kitchen Chef is an AI-powered app that transforms a photo of your pantry ingredients into personalized recipe suggestions.
description:
Kitchen Chef is an AI-powered app that transforms a photo of your pantry ingredients into personalized recipe suggestions.

Kitchen Chef tackles the common dilemma of "what to cook?" by transforming a simple pantry photo into a personalized culinary experience. The application's core functionality is powered by Gemini.
First, it leverages the multimodal understanding of gemini-2.5-flash. Users upload an image of their available ingredients, and the model analyzes this visual data alongside text-based user preferences (like cuisine and cooking time) to generate tailored recipe ideas. The model's ability to output structured JSON is critical, as it ensures the recipe data (ingredients, instructions, calories) is delivered in a clean, parsable format for a seamless user interface.
Second, to elevate the user experience, the app uses imagen-4.0-generate-001 to create photorealistic images of the suggested dishes. This visualization feature is central to the app's appeal, helping users envision the final product and inspiring them to start cooking. Together, these AI features turn ingredient chaos into culinary inspiration, making meal planning effortless and exciting.

ContentVis leverages Gemini's sophisticated multimodal reasoning to analyze and comprehend the user's text, identifying key narrative moments to generate a coherent sequence of images, effectively creating a visual storyboard.

This intelligent scene deconstruction is central to our app. Furthermore, the ability for users to select artistic styles like "comic book" or "pixel art" is enabled by Gemini's nuanced understanding of stylistic prompts. The iterative editing process, where users can refine or regenerate specific images, also utilizes Gemini's powerful image generation from modified text prompts.

ThisCoupleDoesNotExist is a real-time visual automation project that showcases the advanced capabilities of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image through the creation of couples who appear emotionally authentic yet do not exist. This modular pipeline allows for scalable deployment of visuals across web platforms.
By combining Gemini’s image intelligence with real-time automation, ThisCoupleDoesNotExist demonstrates how media can be both scalable and emotionally compelling—pushing the boundaries of creative workflows, identity-safe generation, and dynamic content delivery. It’s not just a demo—it’s a glimpse into the future of personalized storytelling powered by AI.

title: manga-matic
subtitle: AI that makes 4-panel manga.
description:
Problem. A four-panel manga (yonkoma) tells a mini-story in four equal frames—setup, development, twist, conclusion. Most generative tools output isolated images; crafting a coherent strip with recurring characters, stable tone, and controlled framing still takes manual storyboarding.

Solution. Manga Matic turns a short prompt into a finished four-panel comic in Google AI Studio. It drafts a compact script (panel beats, concise dialogue, and shot hints) and then renders each panel to match that plan. Crucially, Gemini 2.5 Flash Image maintains character consistency across panels—leveraging brief style descriptors and (optionally) reference portraits so faces, outfits, and inking remain stable from frame to frame. Users pick story tone (e.g., kishōtenketsu, slice-of-life), art style (mono, shōnen-ink, pastel, etc.), and layout guidance to keep the strip readable and on-brand.

Impact. Four panels are snackable stories that boost scannability and shareability. Product teams can explain features or policy changes in under a minute; marketing can turn release notes into comics for social feeds. Consistent recurring characters build brand memory, while panel-level generation makes it easy to A/B test punchlines, tones, and shots. The result: faster storytelling cycles, clearer messaging, and a recognizable narrative style that audiences want to follow.

https://x.com/jiva_raut/status/1964733979292242126
Stencil is an interactive web app that transforms any real-world task into a personalized, step-by-step visual guide. Instead of static instructions or generic tutorials, users upload photos of their own tools, ingredients, or materials, and Stencil generates a plan that edits those photos to show exactly how each stage should look.

With Stencil, you can cook a recipe, repair a bike, sew a torn shirt, assemble furniture, or practice creative projects like crafts and painting—all guided by clear instructions paired with realistic visual progress shots. Key features include the ability to insert extra steps whenever more detail is needed, regenerate or clarify specific steps with custom instructions, and recalibrate the plan if your situation changes by uploading a new photo. Each workflow feels interactive and adaptive, adjusting to the user rather than forcing them to follow a rigid tutorial.

title: EmojiEmoji
subtitle: Turn any image into a set of consistent emojis!
description:
Client‑side, we slice the single grid into tiles, compute a content bounding box, re‑center each tile with a uniform margin, then scan each row from left and right to make near‑white edge pixels transparent until the first colored pixel—preserving the emoji while removing background. While not perfect it gets the job done for a first pass at transparency & allows for easy touch ups in much more robust image editors. This produces clean, ready‑to‑use PNG stickers. The UI supports webcam capture, style selection, per‑emoji clipboard copy, and one‑click ZIP download.

title: Ai image studio

description:
AI Image Studio: The Enterprise Productivity Tool for Visual Content
AI Image Studio is a web application designed to eliminate the bottleneck in visual content creation that slows down businesses. Instead of relying on slow design workflows, our tool empowers any team member—from marketing to project management—to instantly generate and edit professional, on-brand images.

The application transforms simple business ideas into high-quality visual outputs through a suite of intelligent, guided agents. A marketer can create a product photo for an ad in seconds, a strategist can prototype a full video storyboard in minutes, and a social media manager can generate banners for campaigns without needing to be a prompt expert.

The real innovation lies in our editing tools, powered by Gemini. The “High-Fidelity” agent enables complex edits with incredible precision, such as adding a logo to a model’s clothing while perfectly preserving facial features. Even more powerful is our “Continuity Director,” which solves the biggest challenge in sequential art: visual consistency, using each generated panel as a reference for the next.

title: NanoCanvas
subtitle: The AI canvas where small ideas spark limitless creations.
description:
The application's core "fusion" capability relies on the model's powerful multi-modal understanding. It sends a visual snapshot of the user's layout, source images, and text prompts to Gemini, which interprets the entire scene to generate a new, contextually aware image.

Specific editing tools leverage other key features. Inpainting is the engine behind "Magic Fill" and "Magic Replace," allowing users to seamlessly edit masked areas of an image using text or another image as a guide. Outpainting drives the "Generative Expand" feature, intelligently extending an image's boundaries to create a larger, coherent scene based on the existing content.

These Gemini capabilities are central to NanoCanvas, enabling it to go beyond simple image placement and become an interactive partner that understands and contributes to the user's creative process.

This combination of image analysis, targeted visual modification, and contextual text generation is the engine behind the app's guidance system. It transforms a simple camera feed into an intelligent "lens" that offers actionable, easy-to-understand assistance in high-stress emergency scenarios. The model's ability to deliver both visual cues and clear instructions makes it indispensable to the application's mission.

✨ What It Does
• AI Image Generation & Editing → powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash Image via secure serverless proxy
• Conversational, Region-Aware Edits → natural language + brush-painted masks
• Prompt Enhancement → Gemini 2.5 Flash Lite with live prompt tips
• Workflow Tools → branching history, undo/redo, variant comparison, PNG export
• Reference Images → up to 2 style/content guides, plus seed & temperature controls
• SynthID Watermarking → invisible provenance baked into outputs

title: Comic Crafter AI
subtitle: Generate character-consistent comic strips in minutes using the power of generative AI. From character concept to a print-ready PDF.
description:
Generate character-consistent comic strips in minutes using the power of generative AI. From character concept to a print-ready PDF.

** 🌟 Introduction**
Comic Crafter AI is a web-based application designed to democratize comic creation. It tackles one of the biggest challenges in AI image generation—character consistency—by building a seamless, intuitive workflow for generating complete comic strips. Whether you're a writer storyboarding a scene, a marketer creating visual content, or a hobbyist exploring creative AI, this tool removes the artistic barrier and lets your narrative shine.

✨ Key Features
🤖 Consistent Character Generation: Define your protagonist once. The AI uses the image from the previous panel as a reference to keep your character's appearance, clothing, and style consistent across the entire comic.
✍️ AI Narrative Assistant: Stuck for a story? Provide a simple prompt (e.g., "a detective finds a mysterious clue"), and the AI will generate a complete, multi-panel storyboard with scene descriptions, character actions, and dialogue.
⚙️ Full Creative Control: Manually write or edit every scene description, character expression, and line of dialogue. You have fine-tuned control over every narrative detail before generation.
🔄 Resilient Panel Generation: If a single panel fails to generate, the process doesn't stop! The failed panel is clearly marked with an in-app Retry button, allowing you to regenerate it without losing your progress or consistency.
🎨 Thematic PDF Export: Download your finished comic as a high-quality, multi-page PDF. The PDF features a vibrant, retro comic-book background with a halftone dot pattern and an intelligent 2x3 panel grid for a professional, print-ready look.
🚀 How It Works
The application guides you through a simple three-step process to create your comic.

The biggest barrier we saw wasn’t desire but confidence. People want to fix things but don’t always know how. SozoFix is built to change that by acting as an AI-powered companion that can look at a broken toaster, a pile of bottle caps, or a wobbly chair and say: “I can help you fix that.”

Image to LEGO is an AI-powered web application that instantly transforms any uploaded photograph into buildable LEGO instructions with authentic parts breakdown.
Using Google's Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, the tool analyzes complex objects, identifies appropriate LEGO pieces, and generates realistic conversion strategies complete with official part numbers, quantities, and assembly guides.

Simply upload an image of any object-landmarks, vehicles, buildings, or everyday items-and watch as Gemini's advanced visual understanding converts it into a detailed LEGO build plan. title: AIR(Architectural AI Render)
subtitle: Tired of heavy rendering software? Sketch, chat, and create stunning visuals in a flash. It's rendering, but light as air.
description:
Tired of heavy rendering software? Sketch, chat, and create stunning visuals in a flash. It's rendering, but light as air.

A.I.R (Architecture AI Render) is a lightweight, conversational renderer for architects, powered by Gemini 2.5 Flash Image. Instead of treating the model as a simple text-to-image generator, A.I.R uses it for precise visual control. You upload a sketch, click a point or draw a polygon mask, add a short instruction, and the app builds a multimodal prompt (image + mask + text) to perform point-level edits and inpainting while preserving the original structure. This makes quick, targeted changes—materials, openings, lighting—without rebuilding the whole image, enabling fast, transparent iteration.

The workflow is organized into tabs that mirror how architects think. Upload accepts image files and also supports quick screen capture and crop so you can start from whatever is on your screen. Edit is where you type prompts, get keyword suggestions, and run point or polygon edits for precise local adjustments. Reference is the style-fusion engine: use a moodboard or a single reference image to apply one-tap corrections and blend tone, materiality, and lighting into your sketch; an influence slider lets you dial the effect from subtle to transformative while keeping geometry intact. Moodboard helps you assemble and record reference sets so your visual direction is consistent across iterations. Gallery stores results you like for quick review and comparison. Ask opens a dialogue with the AI about “what to do next,” proposing ways to push the image further or branch into alternatives.

title: Toc Talk by Jay Ryu
subtitle: AI Education Guide for Digitally Marginalized
description:
Hello everyone. My name is Jay Ryu, and I'm here to introduce "Toc-Talk," a web app designed to bridge the digital divide for the digitally marginalized.

My goal is simple: to provide empathetic, structured guidance through an accessible voice interface. I've built this prototype using Python Flask, deployed on Google Cloud Run for scalability and robustness. The core of my app is a powerful integration with the Gemini API, which turns a simple conversation into a powerful educational tool.

What sets me apart is my unique AI-powered mentorship. Instead of a simple chatbot, my model uses a custom prompt to analyze a user's spoken queries and provide a four-step solution: a Problem Summary, an Assumption Analysis, Alternative Solutions, and a clear Action Plan. This approach helps users develop critical thinking skills.

description:
The app that uses AI to turn abstract Chinese characters into vivid, memorable images

Memorizing Chinese characters can be a daunting journey, traditionally requiring endless and repetitive drilling. Our AI-powered application transforms these abstract characters into memorable visual stories.

Users simply select a character and a preferred art style, and our AI instantly generates a visual mnemonic that cleverly embeds the character's form and meaning into a rich scene. For example, the character 休 (xiū), meaning "rest," is depicted as a person leaning against a tree. Similarly, 林 (lín), for "forest," is visualized as two trees standing side-by-side.

title: RealityFlux
subtitle: RealityFlux Live is a browser-based AR tool that streams your camera feed through Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, letting you rewrite your surroundi
description:
RealityFlux Live is a browser-based AR tool that streams your camera feed through Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, letting you rewrite your surroundi

RealityFlux Live streams your camera straight into Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, letting you reshape the world in real time. Each tap or text prompt becomes a masked in-paint request: the current frame plus an on-device segmentation mask and your instruction. Flash Image answers in under two seconds, so the video refreshes almost as fast as you can imagine. We chain successive frames as references, locking in lighting and perspective even while you move. Need something wild? Fusion mode drops brand-new, three-dimensional-looking elements—a chrome panther, hovering neon kanji—seamlessly into the shot. With Nano Banana’s state-of-the-art editing and generation chops, you’re rewriting reality live.

title: AssistableMe
subtitle: Empowering People with Disabilities
description:
This project presents an accessibility-focused application designed to support individuals with cognitive, visual, and hearing impairments through three integrated tools.

The Cognitive Disability Guide assists users who face challenges with memory, attention, or executive function by breaking down activities into simplified, step-by-step instructions. Each step is accompanied by clear text, text-to-speech output, and photorealistic images, ensuring ease of comprehension. Additional features include a pre-defined task library, interactive progress tracking with rewards, task management options, and full voice navigation.

The Visual Impairment Tool improves accessibility for individuals with different types of color blindness. Users can upload any image and apply correction filters tailored to conditions such as protanopia, deuteranopia, or tritanopia. The system, powered by AI, automatically adjusts image colors and provides detailed textual descriptions to enhance visual understanding.
The Hearing Impairment Tool enables visual communication by converting spoken or written input into AI-generated images. This allows users to quickly and effectively express ideas in a visual form.

title: Heritage Reviver
subtitle: Restore History with AI
description:
Heritage Reviver is an innovative web application designed to bridge the gap between history and imagination. Countless ancient wonders now stand as weathered ruins, their original grandeur left to speculation. This tool addresses that challenge by employing powerful AI to digitally reconstruct these sites from a single photograph.

Users simply upload an image of a damaged or aged monument, and the AI meticulously analyzes its architectural style, patterns, and context. It then rebuilds broken structures, repairs eroded surfaces, and restores colors to their former vibrancy. The application presents the transformation through an interactive before-and-after slider, offering a dramatic and insightful comparison. Users can also download the high-quality restored image.

As a powerful visual aid for students, a fascinating tool for tourists, and a reference for historians, Heritage Reviver makes the past tangible. It digitally preserves our shared cultural legacy, fostering a deeper appreciation for the architectural marvels of history.

title: BrandSnaps
subtitle: Build awesome product shots in seconds
description:
My project, BrandSnaps, uses Gemini 2.5 Flash Image to make marketing assets faster and more flexible.

We rely on three key features. First, text-to-image generation lets us turn a simple product description, audience persona, and platform format into a ready-to-use creative. Second, image enhancement and editing allow users to upload their own product photos and instantly adapt them — from “festival themed” to “luxury look” — with just a quick instruction. Third, Gemini’s ability to generate multiple variations at once means a brand gets 4–5 ad options instantly,
This combination makes creative work that usually takes hours (or even a team) possible in just a few seconds.

Kartik Pawar. BrandSnaps. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/brandsnaps. 2025. Kaggle

title: Moral Tales - Parenting Companion
subtitle: Personalized Stories That Teach and Delight
description:
Parents struggle to make moral lessons engaging for children. Generic stories fail to capture a child's attention, making it difficult to teach values like kindness or courage in a memorable way.

Moral Tales generates personalized storybooks where a child learns a chosen moral value through an adventure starring themselves and their pet. Uploading photos unlocks the app's most powerful feature: using Gemini's multi-modal capabilities to generate consistent cartoon avatars of the child and pet, anchoring the entire story with their recognizable likeness for perfect visual consistency.

Multi-turn, in-context editing ensures the child and pet remain perfectly consistent throughout the entire story.

title: Dreamlity-bring
subtitle: Imagine if you could surprise your kid by turning their dream into a superhero story complete with pictures and a voice brings it to life.
description:
Imagine if you could surprise your kid by turning their dream into a superhero story complete with pictures and a voice brings it to life.

current project is live at https://jerax.app
Our application leverages Gemini 2.5 Flash Image as the central creative engine for transforming a child’s dream into a fully illustrated storybook. The most important capability is identity-consistent multi-image generation. Each child protagonist must appear the same across all scenes — same hair, outfit, and features — so that the story feels coherent and personal. Gemini 2.5 Flash Image makes this possible by conditioning on descriptive prompts that reference the child’s appearance, ensuring that consistency is maintained throughout multiple illustrations.

We also rely on its image editing and fusion abilities. For example, prompts can instruct the model to add contextual elements (firefighter helmet, water hose, glowing lights) or modify backgrounds to reflect different moments in the narrative while preserving the hero’s identity. This allows us to adapt one character into multiple story settings without retraining or manually editing artwork.

title: Story Weaver
subtitle: An interactive web application that turns your ideas into an illustrated kids' book
description:
An interactive web application that turns your ideas into an illustrated kids' book

AI Story Weaver is an interactive web application that turns text into an illustrated children's storybooks. It transforms a user's simple text prompt or initial image into a complete visual narrative with a consistent art style.

When a user adds to their story, the application doesn't just generate a new, separate image. Instead, it sends the image from the previous page along with the new text prompt to the model. Gemini then performs an in-place edit on the existing image, modifying it to reflect the new story development described in the prompt.

Users then select an occasion (Birthday, Anniversary, Baby Arrival, Festival), and Gemini 2.5 Flash Image applies an appropriate visual style and frame. Inspirational concept art that serves as a powerful visual reference for the game's art style.

title: FormatForge: The AI-Powered Universal Content Adaptation Engine
subtitle: One Asset, Perfectly Formatted for Every Platform. Automatically.
description:
FormatForge leverages the advanced multimodal capabilities of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image to solve a critical and widespread problem in digital content creation: the immense manual effort required to adapt a single image for dozens of different platforms, each with unique and strict technical and aesthetic guidelines.

The core of our application is built upon Gemini's powerful image-to-image editing and world knowledge. For each target platform (e.g., Amazon, Zomato, Instagram), we provide Gemini with a highly structured prompt that encodes the platform's specific requirements from Amazon's mandated pure white background (#FFFFFF) to Zomato's need for appetizing, vibrant food imagery. Gemini doesn't just resize; it performs semantic, knowledge-aware transformations. It understands the context of "e-commerce compliance" versus "social media engagement," allowing it to execute complex edits like intelligent background replacement, object-centric recomposition, professional color grading, and style-consistent outpainting to change aspect ratios.

This ability to fuse a platform's digital "reality" with the original image is the central innovation of our application. It transforms Gemini from a creative tool into a powerful utility, automating a high-friction workflow and enabling creators and businesses to scale their content effortlessly across the entire digital landscape.

title: Aura Sync.
subtitle: AuraSync is an AI powered composition engine that integrates multimodal generation (scene + product) with a refinement loop , enabling users
description:
AuraSync is an AI powered composition engine that integrates multimodal generation (scene + product) with a refinement loop , enabling users

AuraSync is a hackathon MVP that transforms how visuals are created for marketing, product design, and creative industries. Traditionally, producing believable lifestyle imagery requires expensive photo shoots, complex editing, or long lead times. AuraSync eliminates these barriers by allowing anyone to generate a photorealistic scene and seamlessly place a product into it using just a single prompt.

AuraSync leverages Gemini 2.5 Flash Image in a way that goes beyond simple generation. It fuses multiple inputs (scene + product + placement instructions) into a single composite, then allows rapid prompt driven refinements without needing manual edits. The “lock-and-refine” workflow is novel: once a base composition is created, scene and product inputs are fixed, and users can iteratively adjust lighting, scale, style, or mood with natural language. This delivers a uniquely fast, creative, and accessible experience that would be impossible with traditional tools.

title: Turning Google Maps into Impossible AI Worlds
subtitle: From any Streetview Image in Google Maps to Images generated by Nano Banana
description:
Terraformer is an innovative web application developed for the Google Nano Banana 48 Hour Challenge that redefines AI image generation. The core problem it addresses is the critical lack of geographic precision in current generative AI. While impressive at abstract creation, existing models struggle to transform specific, recognizable real-world locations into imaginative, contextually rich artistic interpretations. This leaves a significant gap for applications demanding geographical accuracy in visual storytelling and design.

Terraformer directly bridges this gap by leveraging Google Gemini 2.5 Flash's advanced image-to-image capabilities and its unique "world knowledge integration." Our application provides a seamless workflow: users pinpoint any location on Earth via an interactive Google Maps interface, from which real-time satellite imagery is extracted. This precise geographical image then serves as the core input to the Gemini 2.5 Flash API, alongside user-selected creative prompts for style (e.g., Realistic, Pixel Art, Oil Painting), population (e.g., Bananas, Robots, Superheroes), and time period (e.g., Medieval, 1980s, Prehistoric). This direct integration allows Gemini 2.5 Flash to generate immersive, street-level artistic interpretations that are both geographically accurate and richly imagined—a feat previously impossible. We’ve effectively given AI a "GPS for its imagination," enabling it to ground boundless creativity in specific reality.

Eric Risco de la Torre. Turning Google Maps into Impossible AI Worlds. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/turning-google-maps-into-impossible-ai-worlds. 2025. Kaggle

title: Dream Weaver
subtitle: A Conversational Canvas for Your Dreams
description:
Dream Weaver transforms the fleeting, abstract nature of dreams into tangible, interactive art. It's an AI-powered journal that allows users to not just visualize their dreams, but to collaboratively explore and shape them in a way that feels like sculpting a memory.

At its core, Dream Weaver is built upon the powerful conversational image editing and multi-modal prompting (image-and-text input) capabilities of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image. The user’s initial dream description generates a base image. From there, a magical feedback loop begins. By providing follow-up text commands like "make the sky more purple" or "add a friendly fox," the user iteratively refines the scene. Gemini uses the previous image as context, ensuring changes are seamless and stylistically consistent.

This turns static image generation into a dynamic dialogue, making the AI a true creative partner. The process is intuitive, personal, and showcases a future where interacting with visuals is as natural as a conversation.

An AI-powered service that transforms photos from your phone into professional-grade images using 3D simulation and expert photography featu

Snap-to-Pro is a groundbreaking AI photo editing service that turns ordinary images into extraordinary works of art. Utilizing Gemini's powerful 3D Perspective Transformer feature, our service allows you to manipulate images as if they were 3D models in a Unity-like environment. Users can freely rotate and adjust the camera angle to create new perspectives, or even simulate entire scenes. Additionally, the Expert Editor feature lets you apply professional styles, such as a studio portrait or a fashion magazine cover, with a single click. With Snap-to-Pro, you're not just editing photos; you're becoming a creative visionary, transforming your simple snapshots into imaginative, professional-quality masterpieces.

description:
Speak in an emergency, and AI instantly responds with alert visuals and reassuring voice guidance

In emergencies, every second counts. Our project, AI-Powered Emergency Voice-to-Action System, allows users to speak their emergency, and AI instantly responds with visual alerts and reassuring voice guidance. Using Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, the system generates dynamic alert screens with relevant icons (ambulance, fire, police), while ElevenLabs produces realistic voice confirmations. Fal powers the frontend to seamlessly integrate visuals and audio, creating a fully interactive experience.

The video demo shows a user speaking commands like “Call an ambulance!” or “Fire in the kitchen!” and AI instantly detecting the urgency, displaying alert visuals, and playing the voice response. This creates a “wow-factor” by simulating a life-saving real-world application entirely with software.

title: EcoMatrix
subtitle: Metamorphoses your myths into mesmerizing eco-manga, molded by NanoBanana magic.
description:
Metamorphoses your myths into mesmerizing eco-manga, molded by NanoBanana magic.

Not exactly though! But, Google Gemini's AI companion 2.5 Flash Image, fondly called Nano Banana, provides capability to transmute text to top-notch images with dynamically indispensable features. To spread climate awareness, the author chooses the comic storytelling route by creating the AI-enabled app EcoMatrix to promote environmental awareness. The Nano Banana model allows users to prompt their text and images to generate a blend of text and high-fidelity comics in this venture.

The app integrates text and image prompts of the user into a seamless "blends realities". These features give life to the characters of the comic story. The "User-as-hero" feature enables it to personalize the talk and narrative by uploading a photo of the user. The Gemini Multimodal model generates a visual description by fusing the prompted text and photo. The 4-panel comics are created with the requisite aspect ratio. The "apply comic book style" prompt transforms the base image into a comic of the desired style. It can generate a maximum of three pages. Quick effects can be employed to add new features from a suite of pre-written prompts. With image refinement options, the image and text can be iteratively modified and improved multiple times.

title: Nusantara Portraits: Personalised Cultural Journey through Gemini
subtitle: Transform a single selfie into authentic, province-by-province Indonesian portraits.
description:
Transform a single selfie into authentic, province-by-province Indonesian portraits.

Indonesia’s diversity spans more than thirty provinces, each with its own dances, traditional dress and landscapes. Nusantara Portraits allows users to upload a single selfie and then take a personalised tour of these cultures. The application sends the selfie as an image part to Gemini 2.5 Flash Image and provides a culture‑specific text prompt instructing the model to dress the subject in regional attire, place them in an authentic location and depict them performing traditional activities. Using the model’s character‑consistency capability, the same face is reused across dozens of outputs while outfits, poses and scenes change.

Gemini 2.5 Flash generates 100–150‑word cultural descriptions that explain the significance of the attire, activity and location. The result is an engaging digital scrapbook that teaches users about Indonesia’s intangible heritage while demonstrating the advanced consistency, fusion and editing features of Gemini.

Gemini 2.5 Flash Image Integration
ArtVisionX Studio leverages Gemini 2.5 Flash Image's (Aka Nano Banana 🍌) multi-modal capabilities as its foundation. The application combines user-uploaded images with detailed text descriptions, sending both to the model simultaneously. This enables comprehensive image transformation where input photos become subjects that are intelligently rearranged, have backgrounds removed, and get integrated into entirely new generated scenes matching desired styles and resolutions.
The iterative refinement feature forms the application's core user experience. After initial generation, users provide conversational text commands to modify outputs. This utilizes the model's ability to understand and execute edits on existing images, creating a dialogue between user and AI.

These features make complex design tasks accessible through natural language interaction, eliminating traditional software complexity while maintaining professional-quality results. The model's image understanding and generation capabilities enable seamless creative workflows.

subtitle: Advanced canvas editor with AI generation, infinite workspace, and pro-grade interactions
description:
Advanced canvas editor with AI generation, infinite workspace, and pro-grade interactions

Corlena is a professional, Figma‑inspired canvas editor with AI‑assisted image generation and a WebAssembly engine for high‑performance interactions. It’s both a product (Corlena AI Canvas) and a reusable open‑source toolkit (the corlena UI library + @corlena/wasm engine) intended to be the foundation for serious, web‑based design tools.

1) AI Generation: Prompt → generate → auto‑added to canvas as a layer.
2) Pro Editing: Select → drag anywhere → resize via any handle → export.
3) Infinite Canvas: Pan/zoom for large scenes with stable performance.
4) Layer Panel: Toggle visibility/locking → export single or combined.

title: Ruyanla: Dream interpreter
subtitle: Tell the dream and let's visualize and interpret it.
description:
Goal: Transform the abstract experience of dreams into tangible, visual art and meaningful insights using AI.
Problem: Dreams are an incredibly powerful but fleeting part of our lives. They are often difficult to recall and even harder to explain to others. This project aims to bridge the gap between a private, subconscious experience and a concrete, shareable record.
Solution: Ruyanla is a multi-modal AI tool designed to be your personal dream weaver. It leverages the advanced capabilities of the Gemini 2.5 Flash Image API (also known as "Nano Banana") to create highly personalized outputs. User simply provides a written description of his/her dream, along with his/her own images that are relevant to the dream's themes or characters. The system then processes this information using a powerful AI pipeline to create two key outputs:
Vivid Visuals: Ruyanla will generate a series of unique, surreal, and personalized images. By using the user's uploaded images as a reference, the AI can maintain character and style consistency, ensuring the generated visuals feel like a true "snapshot" of the dream. These images serve as a visual diary that user can revisit and reflect on.
Dream Analysis: The system provides a comprehensive breakdown of user dream's potential meaning. This analysis draws from two sources:
Cultural & Symbolic: It interprets common dream elements through the lens of psychology and ancient dream symbolism. This includes fascinating traditions like the Turkish belief of telling bad dreams to running water, which is a powerful way to release and cleanse negative thoughts.
Scientific: It offers insights from modern neuroscience, explaining the possible biological and cognitive reasons behind what the user experienced.
Why It Matters: Ruyanla is more than just a dream interpreter; it's a tool for self-discovery and creative expression. By giving users dreams a visual and analytical form, they can gain a deeper understanding of your own thoughts and emotions, and even use these outputs as a source of inspiration for art, writing, or other creative projects.

ahmet bektes. Ruyanla: Dream interpreter . https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/dream-weaver. 2025. Kaggle

title: Your K-pop Idol. Your K-Drama. Your Fantasy.
subtitle: Step into a living K-Drama where your choices write the script, design the face, and build your own K-pop Idol!
description:
Step into a living K-Drama where your choices write the script, design the face, and build your own K-pop Idol!

AIoIA invites users to become co-authors in a personal K-drama, shaping a branching story that progressively reveals their unique AI K-pop idol's appearance. Instead of a single prompt, you embark on an interactive narrative where each choice—from a dialogue option to a location—defines your idol’s look, from their hair color to their clothing style. We use Gemini’s powerful models to generate this dynamic, choice-driven story and visualize each cinematic scene, building a true emotional connection with your idol before the final creation.

This narrative journey culminates in the co-creation studio. Here, the core magic of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image comes alive. Users conversationally perfect their final photocard by pairing the current image with a simple text command, such as “add cherry blossoms to the background.” Gemini processes this multimodal prompt, fusing image and text to instantly generate the edited version. To keep the creativity flowing, the AI proactively suggests inspiring edits based on your last change. title: EduVisualizer: Consistent Character AI for Educational Content
subtitle: EduVisualizer uses Gemini 2.5 Flash Image to keep a consistent character across educational topics, enhancing learning
description:
EduVisualizer uses Gemini 2.5 Flash Image to keep a consistent character across educational topics, enhancing learning

![](YouTube video url to embed)###Problem Statement
Educational content creators struggle with visual consistency across learning materials, often featuring different characters or art styles that fragment the learning experience. We identified a compelling opportunity to leverage Gemini 2.5 Flash Image's advanced reference-based generation capabilities to solve this challenge.
Our application harnesses three core Gemini 2.5 Flash Image features that are central to our solution:
• Multi-modal Reference Integration: We utilize Gemini's ability to accept both text prompts and reference images simultaneously, enabling us to maintain perfect character consistency by using a base character image as visual context for all subsequent educational scene generations.
• Complex Educational Context Understanding: Gemini 2.5 Flash Image demonstrates remarkable capability in interpreting sophisticated educational prompts while maintaining character integrity across diverse learning concepts—from photosynthesis to Newton's laws.
• Advanced Prompt-to-Image Synthesis: The model's ability to generate pedagogically appropriate, clearly labeled educational diagrams while preserving specific character features showcases its sophisticated understanding of both visual consistency and educational requirements.

These Gemini features are not just supplementary—they are the foundation enabling educators to create cohesive, engaging visual learning experiences where students build familiarity with consistent characters across unlimited educational topics, transforming fragmented content into connected learning journeys.

title: ![🍌] BananaMD
subtitle: Illustrate your Markdown with Nano Banana
description:
Flow:
(1) For references without an existing image, Gemini Flash (text) reads the whole document plus a 500‑character local window and proposes two candidate descriptions. These are templated into two “nano‑prompt” prompts, and Nano Banana renders the two proposals.
(2) For references with an image, the left proposal edits the original with an explicit instruction—“redraw in the attached style reference; preserve composition and subjects”. The right proposal is rendered from a Gemini‑generated description of the original via the same text‑to‑image path.
(3) Users refine either side with chat‑like, anchored edits that keep the current image as the base. Once a choice is made for every reference, Gemini Flash (text) receives the selected image (as inline data) to produce a web‑safe filename slug and a concise alt text. BananaMD exports an updated Markdown file and an images.

David Romero Santos. ![🍌] BananaMD. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/bananamd. 2025. Kaggle

title: AI Moodboard – Intelligent Moodboard and Scene Generator

description:
Creating moodboards is often a time-consuming and manual process that requires categorizing objects, arranging visuals, and translating abstract concepts into coherent themes. This challenge is common across creative industries such as interior design, branding, media production, and even for individuals like new homeowners who want to visualize their space.

My project, AI Moodboard, leverages Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (aka Nano Banana) features to address this gap. Specifically, Gemini’s advanced image understanding enables automatic recognition and categorization of uploaded objects, while its scene generation capabilities synthesize these objects into realistic visual layouts. These features are central to the application: instead of requiring users to manually assemble moodboards, the AI analyzes input images, groups them by theme, and generates both a structured moodboard and a complete scene where the chosen elements are seamlessly integrated.

By harnessing Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, AI Moodboard delivers efficiency, clarity, and versatility. It reduces hours of manual effort into a few seconds of automated processing, enabling professionals and individuals alike to visualize and communicate their ideas with ease.

title: StoryCraft AI
subtitle: StoryCraft AI — Turn a Single Idea into a Complete Video Story with Gemini 2.5 Flash
description:
StoryCraft AI — Turn a Single Idea into a Complete Video Story with Gemini 2.5 Flash

Video

StoryCraft AI is a universal storytelling platform that allows anyone — including children, non-writers, and casual creators — to turn a simple idea into a complete, narrated video story using only text or voice input. We leveraged Gemini 2.5 Flash Image to generate key visual scenes from an AI-written narrative structure, making it central to the storytelling process.
The user starts with just a single sentence idea — for example, "a dog finds a magic bone." The system uses real-time LLMs to expand that into a full story (introduction, buildup, climax, and resolution), then breaks it into discrete scenes. Each scene is converted into a descriptive visual prompt, and passed to Gemini Flash, which returns vivid, coherent images that visually represent the story beats. Simultaneously, the full story is narrated using ElevenLabs TTS, and the narration is synchronized with the scene images to create a polished, ~60-second video using Fal for video assembly. The result is a downloadable and shareable video, made entirely from voice or text input — with no editing or technical skills required.
This project demonstrates how Gemini Flash can power automated video storytelling, combining voice, visuals, and AI-written narratives into a fully automated, zero-effort creative experience.

title: FieldGuide AI
subtitle: See It, Understand It: Making Farming Knowledge Visual.
description:
People often turn to LLMs for do-it-yourself advice, whether that’s fixing something at home or solving a problem on the farm. The answers are usually text-only, and while they can be accurate, they’re not always easy to picture or follow in real life. A farmer reading about how to spot a crop disease or set up drip irrigation still has to imagine what that actually looks like, which can lead to confusion or mistakes.

Illustrated Farming Answers solves this by combining LLM text with Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana) to add visuals where they matter most. Instead of flooding every sentence with images, the system highlights just the most important steps or explanations and generates either a diagram (for clear instructions) or a cartoon (for simple storytelling).

We’re showing it in farming because it’s a field full of practical, visual problems, but the same approach could work for any DIY knowledge. The goal is simple: make LLM answers easier to understand by showing people what the words mean, not just telling them.

title: AI3D NanoDimensions
subtitle: What if you can step into the world of a picture via pointclouds and Nano Banana to get the perfect shot?
description:
What if you can step into the world of a picture via pointclouds and Nano Banana to get the perfect shot?

What if you can step into the world of a picture via pointclouds and Nano Banana to re-create and thus visit the scene from a new angle?
We can also enter the world of the proverbially iconic. Let's begin by using NanoBanana as the endpoint on my super old app Napkinmatic (which you might have seen at Woodstock AI, GDC, SIGGRAPH, MIT AI Conference, TED AI, etc) to transform the iconic Banksy silhouette of the girl without a balloon - into a real girl who just lost her heart shaped balloon.
And now: Live demo from the Vision Pro version of my AI3D Nano Dimensions app - and then, we use MoGe to instantly convert this single image into a 3D model right in front of us… so that we change the angle of this new image. We pinch to take a new photo to send to fal.ai NanoBanana to turn our rough 3D model into a real picture.
What if you can time travel through a photograph to get the perfect shot? Nearly Life Size Live Demo from my AI3D Nano Dimensions app. Here we take a postcard depicting Penn Station in the early 1900s, use MoGe to convert it into a sparse hallucination-free point cloud that we can now walk through. And we do our pinch to take our desired snapshot of this rough 3D model from a new angle, and NanoBanana turns it into a real picture. And repeat.
AI3D NanoDimensions uses 3D and novel HCI to apply perspective to see new dimensions and beyond --
What if you can step into the shoes of someone living through a historic moment in time? Shift perspectives via AI3D NanoDimensions, as if you were a Time Lord, and then teleport your consciousness into theirs?

title: AI Sketch Transformer
subtitle: Sketch-to-image generator with super intelligent local editing.
description:
AI image generation typically requires sophisticated text prompting skills to effectively describe the desired visual outcomes.
To address this issue, AI Sketch Transformer allows users to easily create rough sketches of their desired images using HTML5 Canvas technology, and the AI recognizes these sketches and transforms them into detailed, polished artwork.

Transforms simple hand-drawn sketches into professional-quality images, supporting various styles such as photorealistic, illustration, cartoon, and custom. This eliminates the need for complex text descriptions.
The Canvas API captures real-time drawing strokes and converts them into base64-encoded PNG data for AI processing.

Users can erase specific parts of the generated images and describe the changes in natural language. This inpainting functionality creates transparent regions through canvas manipulation, and Gemini 2.5 Flash Image interprets these regions as editing masks to fill in based on surrounding context and textual instructions.
The AI understands erased pixels as editable areas, seamlessly integrating new elements while preserving the original content.

description:
Generate 4 [GitHub repository link]–10 retail-ready product views from a single photo using Gemini Nano Banana

AngleForge is an AI-powered tool that transforms a single product photo into multiple retail-ready views (front, side, back, 3/4, top, etc.). It helps sellers save time on photoshoots and allows buyers to make better purchase decisions with clear, consistent perspectives.

Problem: Online sellers often spend significant time and money capturing multiple product angles, while buyers struggle to visualize items from just one photo.

title: Pacistry - Create your Brand Packaging Design using google flash image
subtitle: We are using ai to change the texture of 3d product mockups
description:
Hey Guys, I am Pratik. I am building Pacistry for FMCG brands, drop-shippers, imprint t-shirt brands , and home business, to help them in packaging design using generative AI. It’s b2b sass where product owner can create, iterate and build faster. Currently I am in experiment phase.

I have my grandma, she likes to blend, bake and make multiple of products like Tamarind Chutney ( Sauce), Chill Sauce. We would put them in small container, usually recycled container. I was helping her with the packaging, I realised she should have her image on the containers. Her Branding. :)
I realised this has been a limiting factor for a lot of house owned business. They usually have a great product, but lack in branding. I think pacistry can help this business, FMCG brands. Using Gen ai to create brand packaging.

There are 3d software available to do something that i am doing (Blender, Maya) . But the process in highly complex. After understanding the workflow that designer go through to create product mockups. I realised 80% of the things can be done in the web. As gen ai in enabling founder to create their own apps. I think founders in manufacturing should be able to create their own brandings as well.

title: ComicMe - Its me
subtitle: AI-Powered Comic Strip Generator Using Gemini Flash Image
description:
The model intelligently detects human faces and blends them into a stylized story, ensuring the character remains consistent across panels. If no face is detected, the system gracefully handles it with a clear message. This integration showcases Gemini’s ability to combine visual input with natural language prompts, enabling a magical storytelling experience that was previously impossible.

ComicMe is built using AI Studio and deployed as a responsive web app. It demonstrates how Gemini Flash Image can revolutionize creative workflows and storytelling by turning static images into immersive visual narratives.

AstinJ. ComicMe - Its me. https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/banana/writeups/comicme-its-me. 2025. Kaggle

title: ChemLab AI
subtitle: Revolutionizing Science Education with AI-Powered Interactive Chemistry
description:
But it doesn't stop there. ChemLab AI is a truly interactive learning companion. By seamlessly integrating the power of Gemini 2.5 Flash Image and ElevenLabs' Speech to Text and Text to Speech API, this has been a user-friendly app especially for those with visual impairments because it will not just allow you to talk and say what you want, but the results will be narrated to you with detailed description of the visual manifestation with multi-sensory approach to the narrative.

ChemLab AI is more than just an app; it's a paradigm shift for science education.** It fosters imagination, deepens comprehension, and democratizes access to hands-on learning. For schools with limited budgets, for students in remote areas, or simply for anyone eager to explore the fascinating world of chemistry without risk or waste, ChemLab AI is the future of scientific discovery.

Join me in building a future where every student can ignite their curiosity and visualize the magic of science. ChemLab AI: where imagination meets innovation, for a brighter, more informed generation.

title: HeadshotAI - Create professional headshot images
subtitle: Upload a photo of you and let AI generate a professional headshot for you.
description:
Elevate your professional image with HeadshotAI, an intuitive app powered by Google’s cutting-edge Gemini Nano Banana (Gemini 2.5 Flash Image) technology. Simply upload your photo—whether a casual selfie or a studio snapshot—and let the AI work its magic. Nano Banana excels at preserving your unique likeness, delivering headshots that are both highly realistic and consistent across edits.

Tailored for business profiles, portfolios, and personal branding, HeadshotAI applies precise, natural-language–based enhancements such as subtle lighting adjustments, background transformations, or wardrobe retouching—without compromising identity integrity.

Uploads are processed blazing-fast, delivering polished results in seconds—ideal for busy professionals seeking efficiency and quality. Every output includes both visible and invisible SynthID watermarks, ensuring authenticity and responsible AI usage.

title: Now & Ever Ephemeral
subtitle: A “memory camera” that turns fleeting moments into digital personal journal of AI-generated images and poems you can revisit anytime.
description:
A “memory camera” that turns fleeting moments into digital personal journal of AI-generated images and poems you can revisit anytime.

Every day, magical moments slip away — the warmth of a friend’s voice in the rain, a child’s first words, a sunrise that stirs your soul. Phones miss the feeling, journals miss the image. Now & Ever bridges that gap: a memory camera that transforms your words into vivid artwork and poetry, preserving not just what happened, but how it felt.

In seconds, you can record a fleeting experience, and the system paints it back as a personalized keepsake — a gallery of emotions, a poetic diary, a map of your life’s hidden beauty. More than a tool, it’s a companion for mindfulness, memory therapy, and creative expression — ensuring the moments you can’t photograph live on.
